infotexts.afflictiondescription.deep_temporary_rei: This character is a temporary crew member. Do not place your own items on them, as they will leave when their time is up.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.deep_bullet_injury: The bullet didn't penetrate the armor but caused blunt trauma. A significant bruise is visible at the impact point. (Torso Cap: 40, This damage heals over time) (Treat with Combat Medical Kit)
The bullet didn't penetrate the helmet but caused blunt trauma. Feeling a bit dizzy. (Head Cap: 70, This damage heals over time) (Treat with Combat Medical Kit)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Shrapnel_residue: Shrapnel is lodged in your body. A medical kit is needed to remove the fragments. (Lethal damage type, This damage heals over time) (Treat with Combat Medical Kit)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hollow_point: A bullet is lodged in your body. A medical kit is needed to remove the slug.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.m18_smoke: Smoke provides cover for your retreat (Gain 50% Headshot Resistance, +25% Spread).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.armor_ceramics: Ceramic plate is intact. Character takes no damage until it breaks.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.hollow_point: You died from a hollow-point bullet.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.deep_headshot_dea: The bullet pierced the brain. Only death awaits.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hollow_point.low: The bullet missed vital organs, but the risk of pain and infection remains.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.deep_headshot_dead: The bullet missed the head, but maybe the next one won't be so lucky. (Cap: 20, Does not cause death when full, This damage heals over time) (Treat with Combat Medical Kit)
infotexts.entitydescription.gold_mineral: ‖color:gui.red‖(Spawns in the abyss of Aphotic Plateau, The Abyss, Hydrothermal Wastes)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Refine in Ore Refinery)‖end‖ Extremely rare gold ore containing small amounts of precious gold, used to make Solid State Drives (SSD).
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_tungsten_ore: ‖color:gui.red‖(Spawns in the abyss of Aphotic Plateau, The Abyss, Hydrothermal Wastes)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Refine in Ore Refinery)‖end‖ Tungsten ore found only in the abyss, used to craft the most penetrating ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_tungsten: Tungsten is used to make penetrating bullets. For this reason, Tungsten has become the most crucial strategic resource on Europa. Both the Coalition and the Separatists are vying for control over Tungsten ore deposits. ‖color:gui.red‖(Refine Tungsten Ore in Ore Refinery)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_tungsten_phy: A combination of refined Tungsten and Physicorium rods. The discovery of Tungsten Physicorium marked a turning point in Europan material science, boasting exceptional quality and hardness exceeding diamond.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gold: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Purified gold, can be used to craft Solid State Drives (SSD) or Gold Bars.‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_hk416: An assault rifle chambered in 5.56x45mm. Features a two-part polymer forend and a free-floating barrel, offering low recoil and good heat resistance. Includes repair tools, striking an excellent balance between performance and utility. (Reload: 1.6s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 850 RPM) (Can repair electrical and mechanical devices)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.56x45: Contains 30 rounds of 5.56x45mm ammunition, suitable for most assault rifles. (Armor Penetration: 0.45) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.56x45_expansion: A heavy drum magazine, inconvenient to carry, making the gun heavier and affecting handling. Contains 60 rounds of 5.56x45mm ammunition, suitable for most 5.56x45 assault rifles. (Armor Penetration: 0.45, -15 Weapon Handling, -15% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖

Contains 60 rounds of 5.45x39mm ammunition, suitable for most 5.45x39 assault rifles. (Armor Penetration: 0.4, -15 Weapon Handling, -15% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖

infotexts.entitydescription.steel_barrel: Steel barrel used for crafting basic weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_part: A box filled with steel firearm parts, including springs, triggers, sights, etc.
infotexts.entitydescription.holographic_sight: Holographic sight providing 1x magnification (-30% Spread, +20% Movement Speed, +15% Damage, +15 Weapon Handling).
infotexts.entitydescription.2x_sight: Provides 2x magnification, allowing the shooter to more easily hit vital spots (-40% Spread, +10 Weapon Handling, +10% Damage, +15% Movement Speed). ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides minor range bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.2.5x_sight: 2.5x sight greatly enhances weapon accuracy, allowing the shooter to hit vital spots more precisely (-60% Spread, +20 Weapon Handling, +5% Damage, +10% Movement Speed). ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides medium range bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.3x_sight: 1-6x "Vudu" sight, highly praised among marksmen. (-80% Spread, +30 Weapon Handling, -25% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(When mounted on Sniper Rifles, DMRs, or Anti-Materiel Rifles, the reticle will focus)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides significant range bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Use Mouse Wheel to zoom)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.red_sight: 1x red dot sight, ideal for indoor assaults (-15% Spread, +30% Movement Speed, +20% Damage, +20 Weapon Handling).
infotexts.entitydescription.chemicalreactionchambe: Reaction chamber used for crafting chemicals (Install with Right Mouse Button + E).
infotexts.entitydescription.saltpeter_powder: White crystalline powder used for making gunpowder.
infotexts.entitydescription.sulfur_powder: Yellow crystalline powder with a foul smell, used for making gunpowder.
infotexts.entitydescription.saltpeter_mineral: White crystalline chunks, can be crushed to make gunpowder.
infotexts.entitydescription.sulfur_mineral: Yellow crystalline chunks, can be crushed to make gunpowder.
infotexts.entitydescription.gun_powder: ‖color:gui.red‖(Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)‖end‖ Basic gunpowder, used for crafting conventional ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.titaniumaluminiumalloy: Titanium barrel, used for crafting high-end weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.physicorium_barrel: A barrel incorporating alien materials, far surpassing existing human materials in heat resistance, corrosion resistance, and mechanical strength.
infotexts.entitydescription.titaniumaluminiumalloy: Precious titanium firearm parts, used for crafting high-end weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.physicorium_part: Extremely rare Physicorium firearm parts. Components made from alien materials exhibit superior performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_sg556: The SG556 uses 5.56x45 ammunition, featuring high damage and accuracy. However, its longer barrel makes it passive in close-quarters combat and prone to overheating. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 690 RPM, -10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_aug: The AUG assault rifle features a bullpup design, firing 5.56x45mm rounds. It boasts advantages like light weight, ease of maintenance, and portability, making it highly popular among security officers. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 0.8, Rate of Fire: 750 RPM, +5% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_c7a1: This extra-long assault rifle from Earth fires 5.56x45mm rounds. Its heavy frame grants the shooter high accuracy, combined with an 800 RPM rate of fire, giving this rifle a significant advantage in combat. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 800 RPM, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_C8-SFW: A carbine using 5.56x45mm ammunition with a very high rate of fire. It utilizes a special 400mm heavy barrel and an improved chamber design, enhancing accuracy, durability, and barrel life. (Reload: 1.8s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 850 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_FAMAS: This rifle uses a special 5.56x45mm straight-insertion magazine. It features high rate of fire, high mobility, and resistance to overheating, although the recoil is a bit high. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 10, Damage Multiplier: 0.8, Rate of Fire: 920 RPM, +5% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_EF88: A bullpup rifle chambered in 5.56x45. Among bullpup assault rifles, it has relatively high damage and good accuracy. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 0.9, Rate of Fire: 780 RPM, +5% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_G36C: An assault rifle chambered in 5.56x45. Its short frame is very suitable for CQC, offering excellent mobility. (Reload: 1.8s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 780 RPM, +10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_HK33: An exquisite assault rifle, based on the roller-delayed blowback action of the G3 rifle series, scaled down for 5.56x45 ammunition. Comes with a 30-round magazine. (Reload: 1.8s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 750 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_L85A2: Successor to the L85A1 rifle, using 5.56x45 ammunition. Reliability has been significantly improved, achieving a balance in performance. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 670 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m4: A modified rifle using 5.56x45 ammunition, equipped with a 317.5mm barrel and a 6-position adjustable stock. A common weapon among arms dealers. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 7, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 800 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_SCAR-H: An exquisite battle rifle using 7.62x51 ammunition. It employs a short-stroke gas piston operating system, resulting in high accuracy, high damage, and significant stopping power. (Reload: 2.2s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_g3a3: Most parts of the G3 are stamped, with few machined components. The receiver is stamped, with grooves pressed on both sides to guide the bolt and secure the buttstock assembly. The G3 barrel uses conventional rifling, and 12 longitudinal grooves are cut into the chamber wall from the mouth to 6.4mm from the breech face to reduce extraction resistance. The G3 is an automatic rifle using the roller-delayed blowback principle, firing the 7.62x51 full-power cartridge. Although the recoil is high, its power is undeniable. ‖color:gui.blue‖(Texture provided by: Shadow Moon Azure Wolf)‖end‖ (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 10, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_7.62x51: Contains 20 rounds of 7.62x51mm ammunition, effective at stopping enemies. (Armor Penetration: 0.65) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_7.62x51_phy: Contains 20 rounds of 7.62x51mm Physicorium ammunition, easily penetrates armor and causes high flesh damage. (Armor Penetration: 0.75) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x51_M61: Contains 20 rounds of 7.62x51mm M61 ammunition. Easily penetrates armor and is highly praised by Coalition special forces. (Armor Penetration: 0.85) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Fulgurium Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x51_M993: Contains 20 rounds of 7.62x51mm M993 ammunition. As the top-tier bullet for full-power rifles, its power and penetration are undeniable. (Armor Penetration: 0.95, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Weapon Overheat)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 9‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Tungsten Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK74M: A classic rifle using 5.45x39mm ammunition, developed from the AK-74. A formidable weapon in experienced hands. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 650 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.45x39: 30 rounds of 5.45x39mm ammunition. Higher damage, lower penetration compared to similar caliber bullets. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.45x39_tit: 30 rounds of 5.45x39mm Titanium ammunition, specialized for dealing with heavily armored units. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.45x39_phy: 30 rounds of 5.45x39mm Physicorium ammunition, easily pierces enemy armor. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_545x39_BS: 30 rounds of 5.45x39mm BS ammunition. Uses Fulgurium powder as propellant, providing high armor penetration. (Armor Penetration: 0.8) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Fulgurium Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.45x39_103: 30 rounds of 5.45x39mm 7N39 ammunition, possessing terrifying penetration power. 7N39 bullets are experimental, prone to overheating, and expensive. Use this as your trump card, handle with care. (Armor Penetration: 0.9, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Weapon Overheat)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 9‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Tungsten Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x39_lead: 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm ammunition, providing higher stopping power. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_7.62x39: 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm Titanium ammunition, providing higher penetration power. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_7.62x39_phy: 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm Physicorium ammunition. The Physicorium tip grants the large caliber bullet higher armor penetration capability. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x39_BP: 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm BP ammunition. Reaches penetration level 8, it is the advanced ammunition of the Separatist special forces. (Armor Penetration: 0.8) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Fulgurium Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x39_MAI_AP: 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm AP ammunition. As the top-tier bullet for the 7.62x39 family, it has extremely high penetration power. (Armor Penetration: 0.9, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Weapon Overheat)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 9‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Tungsten Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK12: The AK-12 assault rifle can use 7.62x39, 5.45x39, and 5.56x45 ammunition, featuring a high rate of fire. Additionally, the AK-12 boasts superior ergonomics; the stock, grip, and safety design provide greater user comfort. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK12_blackice: An AK-12 Black Ice edition produced by the Deep Diving company. Exquisite appearance, irresistible to handle. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_arx200: The ARX200 battle rifle uses 7.62x51 ammunition. It has a relatively high rate of fire among guns using the same caliber, but with significant recoil. WW (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 8, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_R4C: The R4C assault rifle uses 5.56x45 ammunition and offers very high mobility. (Reload: 1.6s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 850 RPM, +15% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AKM: The AKM assault rifle uses 7.62x39 ammunition. High damage, high recoil. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 8, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ASH: Uses 12.7x55 ammunition. Designed for: extreme damage, powerful stopping power, controlled penetration, and reduced effective range to limit its "danger zone". (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 10, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_12.7x55: Very large caliber ammunition, delivering extreme damage. Using Physicorium as the bullet tip compensates for its low penetration depth drawback. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_127x55_PS12B: PS12B armor-piercing round, a new large-caliber AP round developed by the Separatist research department. It can penetrate high-hardness armor and inflict significant flesh damage. (Armor Penetration: 0.8) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Fulgurium Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_SCAR-H_shield: A SCAR-H equipped with a rifle shield. Sacrifices mobility for greatly enhanced head protection. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM, -50% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.SCAR_shield_design: Uses alien materials for the shield, making it incredibly hard and possessing self-repair capabilities.
infotexts.entitydescription.qbz95_chixiao_design: QBZ-95 Chi Xiao Blueprint, can be used to craft its prototype weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.wuchuan_design: An extremely rare Wuchuan blueprint, allowing the crafting of its prototype weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.glassfibre: ‖color:gui.red‖(Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)‖end‖ Fiberglass, an inorganic non-metallic material with excellent properties: good insulation, high heat resistance, good corrosion resistance, high mechanical strength. Commonly used as a base material for weapon bodies. (Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)
infotexts.entitydescription.engineeringplastic: ‖color:gui.red‖(Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)‖end‖ Expensive plastic produced through a series of complex reactions. Excellent corrosion resistance, very suitable for long-term immersion in Europa's underwater environment. (Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK47: An ancient weapon from Earth. For some reason, you instinctively use a special firing technique, as if it's ingrained in your bones. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 8, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK47_gold: An AK made of real gold. Gold should be used for necessities, not aesthetics. "A firearm crafted from resources plundered by the Pirate King. He always kept this gun by his side, even while sleeping." ‖color:gui.yellow‖Deconstruct for Gold!‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 650 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK56: The Type 81 assault rifle uses 7.62x39mm ammunition. It features good accuracy, reliable action, simple operation and maintenance, and performs well in combat. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 7, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK74: The story of the AK-74 automatic rifle actually began in the mid-1960s on Earth. An AK firearm using 5.45x39mm, cheap to produce, durable. This rifle still serves on Europa today. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 650 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK101: Developed from the AK-74M, the AK-101 uses 5.56x45mm ammunition. The AK-101 is essentially an AK-74M chambered for the standard NATO 5.56mm round. Externally identical, except the receiver is marked in English with the caliber "CAL 5.56 NATO". (Reload: 2s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 650 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK103: Similar to the AK-74M, the AK-103 incorporates modern composite engineering plastics, features a 415mm (16-inch) barrel, and an AK-74 style muzzle brake. Can be fitted with scopes and grenade launchers. Fires 7.62x39mm ammunition, equipped with a black plastic 30-round magazine and a plastic folding stock. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK201: The AK-201 is an improved version of the AK-101 assault rifle, designed to enhance performance and adaptability. Uses 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition. Improvements involve materials, manufacturing processes, and some design adjustments to increase reliability and efficiency on the battlefield. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 650 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK15: The AK-15 uses 7.62x39mm ammunition and replaces the fixed-length stock with a folding, adjustable stock, suitable for soldiers of different builds or those wearing body armor. Additionally, the AK-15 uses Picatinny rails, allowing various attachments like optical sights, flashlights, and laser pointers to be mounted above and below the barrel. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK19: The AK-19 was developed based on the 5.45mm caliber AK-12 assault rifle. This individual weapon uses standard NATO 5.56mm ammunition. This rifle is Kalashnikov's latest export model. Differing from previous generations, this model is more ergonomic, suitable for all-day use, and offers higher accuracy. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AK205: The AK-205 is a carbine using 5.45x39mm ammunition, a modernized version of the AK-105. Features a shorter barrel, making it more suitable for indoor CQB. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM, +15 Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pmm: The PMM is small and lightweight, typically carried by officers of mid-rank and above, hence also known as the "Officer's Pistol". It uses a simple blowback operation, is structurally simple, reliable, and low-cost, favored by officers. However, it has a fatal flaw: low penetration depth. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.15)
infotexts.entitydescription.groundglass: ‖color:gui.red‖(Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)‖end‖ Glass primarily refined from silicon, used for crafting various sights. (Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_9mmp: Contains 8 rounds of 9x18mm pistol ammunition, low penetration power. (Armor Penetration: 0.15) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 1‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entityname.ammoreload_machine: Deep Diving Armory Universal Ammo Loader
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_machine: Fully automatic ammo loader, used for pressing ammunition. Logistics can finally enjoy some downtime.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload: Fully automatic ammo loader, suitable for lead rifle rounds. Logistics can finally enjoy some downtime.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox1: Lead ammunition box, can reload 64 lead rifle magazines, 96 lead SMG magazines, 128 lead pistol magazines, 32 lead drum magazines, 16 lead LMG boxes, 8 lead GPMG boxes. (Suitable for lead ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.vertical_grip: The vertical grip allows the shooter to hold the firearm more firmly, improving weapon handling (-30% Stun, -100% Water Flow Effect, +5 Weapon Handling, -10% Movement Speed).
infotexts.entitydescription.vertical_grips_short: A lightweight and compact short grip, enhancing the user's grip and control over the firearm (-20% Stun, -50% Water Flow Effect, +10 Weapon Handling).
infotexts.entitydescription.vertical_grips_hollow_: Metal hollowed-out grip, very suitable for beginners learning how to shoot (-10% Stun, +100% Weapon Handling Skill Gain Speed, +30% Experience Gained).
infotexts.entitydescription.cqr_grips: The CQR tactical grip is the top choice for indoor combat, providing a comfortable grip position for the shooter (During indoor combat: -20% Stun, +10% Movement Speed, +10 Weapon Handling).
infotexts.entitydescription.oblique_grips: The angled grip helps you maintain a firm grip on the firearm during reloads and perform tactical retreats (During reload: +20% Movement Speed, 50% Stun Resistance).
infotexts.entitydescription.corner_grip: The corner grip provides a more comfortable shooting stance (+15% Movement Speed, +25 Weapon Handling).
infotexts.entitydescription.focusingflashlight: The focusing flashlight illuminates further and brighter than a standard flashlight. Built-in nuclear battery, so no recharging required.
infotexts.entitydescription.spreadflashlight: The wide-beam flashlight can illuminate the deep oceans of Europa. Built-in nuclear battery, so no recharging required.
infotexts.entitydescription.focusingflashlight_p: A small flashlight suitable for pistols. Illuminates further and brighter than a standard flashlight. Built-in nuclear battery, so no recharging required.
infotexts.entitydescription.spreadflashlight_p: A small wide-beam flashlight can illuminate the deep oceans of Europa. Built-in nuclear battery, so no recharging required.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_laser: Tactical equipment that emits a red laser, improving the shooter's handling feel at close range and helping to quickly redirect the muzzle away from teammates. (-10% Spread, +10 Weapon Handling) (-50% Damage dealt to friendly targets)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_M1911: The M1911 uses .45 ACP bullets. This pistol employs a short recoil operation principle. Its 11.43mm large caliber ammunition delivers significant stopping power. It is reliable, durable, and easy to maintain. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1s, Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_.45acpmag: Contains 7 rounds of 11.43mm pistol ammunition. Sacrifices penetration for higher stopping power. (Armor Penetration: 0.1) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 1‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_45acpmag_tit: Contains 7 rounds of 11.43mm Titanium pistol ammunition, increasing penetration power. (Armor Penetration: 0.3) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 3‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_45acpmag_phy: Contains 7 rounds of 11.43mm Physicorium pistol ammunition. The Physicorium tip provides high penetration power. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_USP: The USP uses 9x19mm ammunition. Overall length 194mm, barrel length 108mm, weight 748g, effective range 50m, magazine capacity 15 rounds. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.15)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_9mm_2: Contains 15 rounds of 9x19mm pistol ammunition, possessing relatively high penetration power. (Armor Penetration: 0.18) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 1‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_FN57: The FN57 uses 5.7x28mm ammunition, offering excellent penetration. Within effective range, it can penetrate standard body armor, whereas a 9mm pistol round cannot even at 10m. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.25)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fn57_mute: The FN57 FDE is an improved model of the FN57, using 5.7x28mm ammunition. Easily penetrates armor and comes with an integrated suppressor, focusing more on stealth operations. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1s, Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.2, Stealthy while held) (Stealthy: -50% Monster Detection and Hearing Range)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock17: The Glock 17 is a 9mm caliber pistol. It extensively uses plastic parts, significantly reducing weight. Uses 9x19mm pistol ammunition, well-balanced performance. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1s, Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock18c: The Glock 18C is an improved model of the Glock 17, using 9x19mm ammunition. Features a full-auto mode, providing significantly more firepower. Its extremely high rate of fire can empty the magazine in an instant. Using an extended magazine is recommended. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1000 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_18c_buttstock: A stock modification for the Glock 18C, reducing the recoil of the automatic pistol to some extent. (+10 Weapon Handling, -20% Spread, -10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock_mag_stand_t: Contains 17 rounds of 9x19mm Titanium pistol ammunition. Moderate capacity. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock_mag_stand_p: Contains 17 rounds of 9x19mm Physicorium pistol ammunition. Moderate capacity. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock_mag_long_ti: Contains 30 rounds of 9x19mm Titanium pistol ammunition. Higher capacity, but reduces ergonomics. (Armor Penetration: 0.4, -20 Weapon Handling, -10% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock_mag_long_ph: Contains 30 rounds of 9x19mm Physicorium pistol ammunition. Higher capacity, but reduces ergonomics. (Armor Penetration: 0.5, -20 Weapon Handling, -10% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock_mag_drum_ti: Contains 50 rounds of 9x19mm Titanium pistol ammunition. Very high capacity, but significantly reduces ergonomics. (Armor Penetration: 0.4, -40 Weapon Handling, -20% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_glock_mag_drum_ph: Contains 50 rounds of 9x19mm Physicorium pistol ammunition. Very high capacity, but significantly reduces ergonomics. (Armor Penetration: 0.5, -40 Weapon Handling, -20% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.7: Contains 20 rounds of 5.7x28mm Titanium AP pistol ammunition, effectively penetrates armor. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_57_mag_phy: Contains 20 rounds of 5.7x28mm Physicorium AP pistol ammunition, effectively penetrates armor. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_deserteagle: The Desert Eagle pistol uses .50AE ammunition. It employs a gas-operated mechanism and a rotating bolt locking system. It is a high-power hunting pistol adaptable with different caliber barrels to fire various caliber rounds. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.8, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_whiteeagle: An exquisite white Desert Eagle, once the sidearm of a legendary captain. Uses a special receiver to greatly increase the rate of fire. In the hands of an experienced old captain, its full potential can be unleashed. The aiming ring uses alien relics to enhance the user's reaction speed; side effects are unknown. Raising this big iron activates "Deadeye", enemies will be turned to dust in an instant. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 12, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.15, -20% Movement Speed) (Deadeye charges for 1.5s, slows nearby creatures' movement speed, increases own rate of fire and damage resistance when active)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_.50aemag: Contains 7 rounds of .50AE pistol ammunition, capable of turning carbon-based lifeforms into pulp. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 10)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_7.62: Titanium ammunition box, can reload 64 Titanium rifle magazines, 96 Titanium SMG magazines, 128 Titanium pistol magazines, 32 Titanium drum magazines, 16 Titanium LMG boxes, 8 Titanium GPMG boxes. (Suitable for Titanium ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_12.7: Physicorium ammunition box, can reload 64 Physicorium rifle magazines, 96 Physicorium SMG magazines, 128 Physicorium pistol magazines, 32 Physicorium drum magazines, 16 Physicorium LMG boxes, 8 Physicorium GPMG boxes. (Suitable for Physicorium ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_phy_ful: Fulgurium Physicorium ammunition box, can reload 64 Fulgurium Physicorium rifle magazines, 96 Fulgurium Physicorium SMG magazines, 128 Fulgurium Physicorium pistol magazines, 32 Fulgurium Physicorium drum magazines, 16 Fulgurium Physicorium LMG boxes, 8 Fulgurium Physicorium GPMG boxes. (Suitable for Fulgurium Physicorium ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_tun_ful: Tungsten Physicorium reloading box, can reload 64 Tungsten Physicorium rifle magazines, 96 Tungsten Physicorium SMG magazines, 128 Tungsten Physicorium pistol magazines, 32 Tungsten Physicorium drum magazines, 16 Tungsten Physicorium LMG boxes, 8 Tungsten Physicorium GPMG boxes. (Suitable for Tungsten Physicorium ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_du: Depleted Uranium ammunition box, can reload 64 DU rifle magazines, 96 DU SMG magazines, 128 DU pistol magazines, 32 DU drum magazines, 16 DU LMG boxes, 8 DU GPMG boxes. (Suitable for Depleted Uranium ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_7.62: Fully automatic ammo loader, suitable for large caliber rifle rounds. One of the joys of logistics.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_12.7: Fully automatic ammo loader, suitable for extra-large caliber rifle rounds. Logistics ecstasy.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_c1: The C1 SMG's receiver and barrel shroud are integral. The shroud has many cooling holes. It uses a left-side feeding curved magazine and a folding stock. Overall performance is acceptable, its only fatal flaw is the low rate of fire. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 550 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_thompson: The Thompson Submachine Gun M1921 features a stock and foregrip. Empty weight 4.9 kg, total length approx. 860 mm. Fires .45 inch (11.43 mm) Colt automatic pistol rounds, max rate of fire 800 RPM. Feed system options include a 20-round standard magazine or a 50-round large drum designed for SMGs. Also known as the "Chicago Typewriter". Equipped with a large drum magazine, the Thompson can unleash its full potential. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 7, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 750 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_9mm: Portable ammo loader, can be carried around.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_9mm: Ammo box containing a mix of 9mm and 11.43mm pistol rounds. Provides enough ammo for approximately 80 magazines.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_57mm: Ammo box containing 5.7mm pistol rounds. Provides enough ammo for approximately 80 magazines.
infotexts.entityname.ammobox_50mm: Physicorium Large Caliber Pistol Ammo Box
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_50mm: Ammo box containing .50 and .44 pistol rounds. Provides enough ammo for approximately 40 magazines.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_57mm: Portable ammo loader, can be carried around.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_50mm: Portable ammo loader, can be carried around.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_410: This short revolver can fire shotgun shells! Infinite fun. (Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_9mm: Contains 30 rounds of 9mm ammo, suitable for most SMGs. (Armor Penetration: 0.3) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 3‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_9mm_tit: Contains 30 rounds of 9mm Titanium ammo, focusing more on armor penetration compared to lead rounds. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_9mm_du: Contains 30 rounds of 9mm DU ammo. Can penetrate friendly targets to damage enemies. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetrates friendlies without dealing damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Targets hit suffer -30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Depleted Uranium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_9mm_phy: Contains 30 rounds of 9mm Physicorium ammo, possessing high armor penetration value. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_9mm_fu: Contains 30 rounds of 9mm Fulgurium Physicorium ammo, possessing a high penetration level. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Fulgurium Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_9mm_ap: Contains 30 rounds of 9mm Tungsten Physicorium ammo. The culmination of the Coalition Armory's R and D division's efforts, this ammunition boasts a level 8 penetration rating. (Armor Penetration: 0.8, Can penetrate hatches and bulkheads.) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Tungsten Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_tom: Contains 50 rounds of 11.43mm Colt automatic pistol ammo, for the Chicago Typewriter. (Armor Penetration: 0.3) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 3‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Leg Damage: +65%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 3)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_vector: Contains 30 rounds of .45 ACP ammo, suitable for the Vector SMG. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Leg Damage: +65%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 3)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_vector: The Vector SMG boasts a terrifying 1200 RPM rate of fire, capable of turning enemies into Swiss cheese. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 6, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1200 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ntw20: The NTW-20 uses massive 20x110mm anti-materiel rounds. It features three recoil suppression components: an internal hydraulic buffer, a buffer spring, and a muzzle brake, effectively reducing recoil. Warning: Do not use this behemoth without seasoned weapon handling experience. Consequences are your own. ‖color:gui.red‖(Heavy Anti-Materiel Penalty: The lower your health, the lower the damage and accuracy.)‖end‖ (Spread: 30, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 3, -60% Movement Speed) (Movement is nearly impossible while aiming)
infotexts.entitydescription.ntw_20mm: A massive 20mm anti-materiel round, possessing devastating damage and extremely high penetration power, easily pierces cover. (Armor Penetration: 1, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 10)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 10‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 400%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 20)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gm6: When carried, the GM6 "Lynx" barrel can retract into the receiver, reducing the overall length to 928mm, shorter than a standard assault rifle. Combined with its light weight, this makes the rifle very suitable for single-person carry. It boasts the highest mobility among anti-materiel sniper rifles, and its rate of fire is also fast, capable of firing 5 rounds in 3 seconds. (Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.6, -10% Movement Speed) (Can be placed in inventory, no firing penalty)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gm6_mag: Contains 10 rounds of 12.7x99mm anti-materiel ammunition. Combined with the Lynx's excellent mobility, it catches enemies off guard. (Armor Penetration: 0.8, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 400%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 15)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.8x_sight: 8x long-range sniper scope, used for lethal shots with sniper rifles. (-100% Spread, +30 Weapon Handling, +30% Damage, -20% Rate of Fire, -30% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(When mounted on Sniper Rifles, DMRs, or Anti-Materiel Rifles, the reticle will focus)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides extreme range bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.1_3x_sight: A combo sight switchable between 1x and 3x magnification, integrating the advantages of two types of scopes. (-70% Spread, +25 Weapon Handling) ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides significant range bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Use Mouse Wheel to zoom)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.NTW_design: A very rare NTW-20 blueprint, used to craft its prototype firearm.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ghost_formula: ‖color:gui.red‖(Obtained as a reward after completing "Operation Ghost", is not consumed)‖end‖ Equipment used by the Ghost Squad, highly encrypted by the Coalition. Requires killing the Ghost Squad leader to obtain.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_grizzlies_formula: ‖color:gui.red‖(Obtained as a reward after completing 'Grizzly Rampage', is not consumed)‖end‖ Equipment used by the Grizzly Squad, highly encrypted by the Separatists. Requires killing the Grizzly Squad leader to obtain.
infotexts.entitydescription.gauss_design: A very rare Gauss Rifle blueprint, used to craft its prototype firearm.
infotexts.entitydescription.aa12_design: A very rare AA-12 blueprint, used to craft its prototype firearm.
infotexts.entitydescription.gm6_design: A very rare GM6 "Lynx" blueprint, used to craft its prototype firearm.
infotexts.entitydescription.saintpredator_design: A very rare Saint Predator blueprint, can be used to craft its prototype weapon.
infotexts.entitydescription.whiteeagle_design: A very rare White Eagle blueprint, used to craft its prototype firearm.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_44Magnum: A revolver using .44 Magnum ammunition. High flesh damage. Raising the gun activates "Iai", unloading 6 rounds into the enemy before you. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 8, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.1) (Deadeye charges for 2.5s, slows nearby creatures' movement speed, increases own rate of fire and damage resistance when active)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_44mag: Contains 6 rounds of .44 Magnum. Using a speedloader greatly increases reloading speed. (Armor Penetration: 0.35) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 3‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_127Magnum: This behemoth uses 12.7x33mm pistol rounds, delivering extreme flesh damage. Using Physicorium tips increases penetration. Shooters can also attach a scope for improved accuracy. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_50glmag: Contains 7 rounds of .50GL, delivering devastating blows to flesh. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 12)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.m500_design: A very rare M500 blueprint, used to craft its prototype firearm.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m500Magnum: The M500 fires .50 Magnum rounds. Its massive caliber can directly pulverize unarmored targets. Additionally, sights can be attached for more precise and lethal shooting. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.8, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_50swmag: Contains 5 rounds of .50SW. This is the largest bullet you can find in a pistol. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 15)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_friendly_fire: The Friendship Shield identifies targets hit. When hitting a friendly target, it deploys a small shield around them, negating the bullet's kinetic energy. However, this component does not affect the user. Meaning, if friendlies do not have it installed, they can still damage you.
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_gun_in_water: Optimizes the bullet shape and enhances sealing, reducing the kinetic energy loss of bullets in water. (No damage falloff for bullets underwater)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_locate: An upgrade designed specifically for lone wolves. When you fall, friendlies can locate your position on the sonar.
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_first_aid: Installing a first aid sling on the firearm allows faster dragging of unconscious teammates. (+10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_rapid_receiver: Replaces the receiver with one capable of higher rate of fire, but increases recoil and reduces accuracy. ‖color:gui.red‖(Effects of the same type do not stack)‖end‖ (+15% Rate of Fire, +30% Spread)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_unstable_gunpowde: Uses higher-energy volatile gunpowder, increasing bullet kinetic energy, but causes the firearm to overheat faster. (+20% Damage, +80% Overheat Rate) ‖color:gui.red‖(Effects of the same type do not stack)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Increased overheat rate does not affect shotguns)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_improved_barrel: Uses an improved, reinforced barrel for more precise shooting and better heat resistance. ‖color:gui.red‖(Effects of the same type do not stack)‖end‖ (-20% Spread, +80% Overheat Recovery Rate)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_oc_gun: Heavily modifies the firearm to reach its theoretical rate of fire and significantly increase power, but drastically reduces accuracy and heat resistance. ‖color:gui.red‖(Effects of the same type do not stack)‖end‖ (+30% Rate of Fire, +30% Damage, +120% Overheat Rate, +80% Spread) ‖color:gui.red‖(Increased overheat rate does not affect shotguns)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_headshot: Adds a cap to the bullet tip, greatly increasing damage to the head, but significantly reduces the cavity effect, lowering damage to the body. ‖color:gui.red‖(Effects of the same type do not stack)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(+100% Headshot Damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(-50% Damage to Limbs and Torso)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_bodyshot: A bullet designed specifically to penetrate armor plates, but weakens penetration against highly angled helmets. ‖color:gui.red‖(Effects of the same type do not stack)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(+1 Penetration Level)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Only deals 20% Headshot Damage)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_cqb: Rigorous CQB training enhances your close-quarters combat capabilities, granting higher movement speed and stun resistance. (‖color:gui.red‖ During Indoor Combat‖end‖: +20% Movement Speed, 25% Stun Resistance, +10% Damage)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_frogman: Frogman training course, cultivating soldiers who can move freely underwater to quickly infiltrate enemy outposts. (‖color:gui.red‖ While Underwater‖end‖: +30% Swim Speed, 50% Water Current Resistance, +50% Oxygen Duration, 25% Stun Resistance, +10% Damage)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_marksman: Marksman is one of the security officer training branches, primarily aimed at cultivating cold, lethal shooters capable of one-shot kills. (When no enemies nearby: +50% Damage, -50% Spread, -20% Rate of Fire) ‖color:gui.red‖ (When enemies nearby: -20% Damage, -30% Rate of Fire)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_commando: Commando training course, focuses on rapidly closing the distance with enemies, compressing their survival space, and gaining tactical advantage for our side. ‖color:gui.red‖(When no enemies nearby: +20% Speed, 25% Stun and Physical Damage Resistance, +50% Spread)‖end‖ (When enemies nearby: +20% Speed, 25% Stun and Physical Damage Resistance, +10% Rate of Fire, +20% Damage)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_heavy_defender: Heavy Defenders undergo rigorous training, wearing the heaviest and hardest armor, serving as the most solid shield in the task force. (When wearing Level 9 or 10 metal plates: +40% Movement Speed) (Self and all nearby teammates: Gain 15% Physical, Stun, Shrapnel Residue Resistance) ‖color:gui.red‖(Self: -30% Damage and Rate of Fire)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_blaster: After systematic course training, you master the use of explosive weapons, such as grenades, grenade launchers, rocket launchers, etc. +50% Explosion Damage +20% Explosion Radius +50% Throwing Distance When crafting, 40% chance not to consume one explosive item.
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_machinegunner: Machine Gunner training course, helps you become the most formidable firepower provider on the battlefield, the core of fire suppression. While holding an LMG, +8% damage for each nearby enemy, max 40% damage. While holding a GPMG, +8% rate of fire for each nearby enemy, max 40% rate of fire. Gain 40% Fatal Headshot Resistance to the head when crouching. ‖color:gui.red‖(When not crouching, -20% Headshot Resistance to the head)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_striker: Striker training guide, specializing in close-quarters combat, becoming the master of indoor CQB. Passive Effect: +20% Movement Speed, Gain 25% Physical and Stun Resistance. When enemies are nearby: -30% Spread, +10% Damage. When holding a shotgun, additional +40% Damage. ‖color:gui.red‖(When no enemies are nearby: +30% Spread, -20% Rate of Fire)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_doc: Combat Medic, a medical soldier proficient in healing, yet their combat effectiveness should not be underestimated. (Medical Skill, Weapon Handling will not be lower than 60) (Unlocks the ability to drag personnel at full speed) (+20% Movement Speed, -50% Debuff Duration)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_ergonomics: Redesigns the armor for better ergonomics, improving human-machine interface. (+20 Weapon Handling, +20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_heavy_armor: Increases overall protection by using better Aramid plates and thickening the body armor, but sacrifices mobility and ergonomics. (Torso gains 20% Gunshot Wound, Shrapnel Residue Resistance) ‖color:gui.red‖(-20% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_strengthening_of_: The torso armor incorporates a blood flow control system. When limbs are injured, it automatically adjusts blood flow to the limbs, promptly reducing the harm caused by blood loss. (Limbs gain 90% Bleeding Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_emergency_defibri: A portable defibrillator is inserted inside the armor, triggering when the wearer suffers severe damage. Due to high power consumption, it can only trigger once per round. (When the primary health bar drops to 0, restores a large amount of health) ‖color:gui.red‖(Can only trigger once per round)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_light_mag: Uses lighter magazines with better ergonomics, increasing reload speed. (Only applicable to magazine-fed weapons)
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalgoggles_sight: 1x thermal sight, reveals enemy heat signatures. Ineffective against Husk-type enemies. 30Hz refresh rate significantly impacts shooting performance. (-30% Spread, -15 Weapon Handling) ‖color:gui.red‖(Thermal Range: 12 meters)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalgoggles_sight_6: 6x thermal sight, reveals enemy heat signatures. Designed specifically for sniper rifles. 60Hz refresh rate provides good shooting feel. (-80% Spread, +25 Weapon Handling, -30% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Thermal Range: 20 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides long-range vision bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m82a1: The M82A1 semi-automatic sniper rifle uses a short recoil principle and semi-automatic firing mode. Its large caliber 12.7x99mm (.50 BMG) ammunition delivers devastating impact. Warning: Do not use this behemoth without seasoned weapon handling experience. Consequences are your own. ‖color:gui.red‖(Heavy Anti-Materiel Penalty: The lower your health, the lower the damage and accuracy.)‖end‖ (Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1, -40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m82a1_blackice: An M82A1 Black Ice edition produced by the Deep Diving company. Hold your breath, steady your aim, fire. Warning: Do not use this behemoth without seasoned weapon handling experience. Consequences are your own. (Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1, -40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ptrd: The PTRD-41 uses a rotating bolt action, manual loading, and automatic ejection. Simple structure, low manufacturing cost, suitable for mass production. Uses 14.5x114mm anti-materiel rounds, undeniable power. Downsides include slow single-shot loading, massive recoil, and noise. Warning: Do not use this behemoth without seasoned weapon handling experience. Consequences are your own. ‖color:gui.red‖(Heavy Anti-Materiel Penalty: The lower your health, the lower the damage and accuracy.)‖end‖ (The trigger is heavy, requires holding LMB for 0.5s to fire) (Spread: 40, Damage Multiplier: 1, Reload: 3s, -60% Movement Speed, 0.5s Charge Time)
infotexts.entitydescription.ptrd_145mm: An anti-materiel round using high-energy propellant, very suitable for destroying hard targets. (Armor Penetration: 0.5, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 400%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 18)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m82a1_mag: Contains 10 rounds of .50 BMG. Uses expensive Physicorium as the tip and higher-energy Fulgurium powder as the propellant, capable of penetrating almost any armor. (Armor Penetration: 0.8, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 400%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 15)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_CZ75: The CZ75 standard design is a service pistol with a high-capacity magazine and double-action trigger. Its grip is ergonomically designed. The firing mechanism uses a double-action principle, making it simple and quick to operate. Combined with a 1000 RPM rate of fire, this pistol reigns supreme in close-range protection. ‖color:gui.red‖(When holding a pistol with health below 50%, triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire)‖end‖ (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 8, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1000 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_cz75mag: Contains 15 rounds of 9x19mm pistol ammunition. Uses Titanium tips for higher penetration. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.gun_powder_fulgurium: ‖color:gui.red‖(Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)‖end‖ Made by mixing Fulgurium powder with conventional gunpowder. Possesses higher energy than regular gunpowder, commonly used for crafting advanced bullets. (Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)
infotexts.entitydescription.extended_barrel: The extended barrel attachment increases shooting accuracy and base damage. However, to prevent overheating damage, the firearm's rate of fire is reduced. Installation increases recoil, requiring higher weapon handling skill to compensate. (-30% Spread, +20% Damage, -15% Rate of Fire, -15 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_flash_hider: The flash hider allows the firearm to perform better during mobile shooting, excelling in maneuvering and offensive engagements. (While moving forward or backward: +20% Damage, -10% Spread, +10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_compensator: The compensator performs better during defensive shooting, offering an advantage when firing from cover. (While stationary: +10% Damage, -10% Spread, +10 Weapon Handling, Gain 20% Damage Reduction)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_muzzle_brake: The muzzle brake effectively reduces firearm recoil, though the reduction is slightly weaker compared to other muzzle devices. (-30% Spread, +20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_muffler: The suppressor is ideal for assassination missions, providing strong burst potential, but causes the firearm to overheat faster. ‖color:gui.red‖(Work In Progress, Display Only)‖end‖ (+100% Overheat Rate, +10 Weapon Handling) (Within 1.5s after firing: +50% Damage, -20% Spread)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mac10: The MAC-10's design emphasizes compactness and portability. Its unique, box-like appearance is unforgettable. Uses .45 ACP ammunition, displaying astonishing lethality at close range. However, this comes with high recoil, requiring the shooter to invest more training and skill to master its firing. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 15, Damage: 1, Rate of Fire: 1200 RPM) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_mac: Contains 30 rounds of .45 ACP ammo, the "raindrops" specifically crafted for the Mac-10. (Armor Penetration: 0.3) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 3‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Leg Damage: +65%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mp5k: The MP5 SMG's action structure is similar to the G3 automatic rifle, using the same semi-free bolt and roller-locking mechanism. This results in a very low bolt head recoil velocity during unlocking, delaying the unlock time and reducing vibration during firing for better accuracy. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 800 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ump45: The UMP45 SMG's operating principle is no longer the traditional semi-free bolt action of the MP-5, but rather a simple blowback action. Compared to most SMGs that use a bolt-open, open-bolt structure, this design improves accuracy, and the trigger operation is very light and flexible. Additionally, to facilitate control during full-auto fire and reduce dispersion, the UMP45 is equipped with a rate reducer, limiting the rate of fire to 580 RPM. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_ump45: Contains 25 rounds of .45 ACP ammo, an excellent choice for stopping enemies. (Armor Penetration: 0.3) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 3‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Leg Damage: +65%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 3)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_ump45_phy: Contains 25 rounds of .45 ACP Physicorium ammo, high armor penetration. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Leg Damage: +65%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 3)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_ump45_tit: Contains 25 rounds of .45 ACP AP ammo. High stopping power + some armor penetration. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Leg Damage: +65%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 3)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_smg_lead: A box of SMG ammunition, containing a mix of lead bullets. Can reload approximately 60 magazines. (Suitable for lead SMG ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_smg_tit: A box of SMG ammunition, containing a mix of titanium bullets. Can reload approximately 60 magazines. (Suitable for titanium SMG ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammobox_smg_phy: A box of SMG ammunition, containing a mix of physicorium bullets. Can reload approximately 60 magazines. (Suitable for physicorium SMG ammunition)
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_smg_lead: Portable ammo loader, suitable for SMGs.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_smg_tit: Portable ammo loader, suitable for SMGs.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammoreload_smg_phy: Portable ammo loader, suitable for SMGs.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mp5sd: The MP5SD's suppressor doesn't completely eliminate the sound of gunfire, but it can make it unrecognizable at a certain distance. The structure of the MP5SD suppressor involves 30 small holes (3mm diameter) drilled into the barrel, covered by a suppressor tube containing two separate gas expansion chambers. During firing, some propellant gas enters the rear expansion chamber through the barrel holes, reducing gas pressure and thus decreasing the acceleration of the moving bullet. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 0.9, Rate of Fire: 800 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_p90: The P90 SMG is the world's first personal defense weapon using entirely new ammunition. The P90 uses high-velocity 5.7mm bullets. Its heavy magazine holds 50 rounds, and it has a high rate of fire of 14 rounds per second. The 5.7x28mm ammunition can easily penetrate level III, IV, and even V body armor. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 850 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pdw: Looks like a pistol, yet like an SMG, and also a bit like a rifle. This new type of individual weapon combines the advantages of pistols, SMGs, and rifles, opening a new era in military small arms. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 800 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_p90: Contains 50 rounds of 5.7mm ammunition, easily penetrates body armor. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 0.8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_kit_small: A small, portable medical kit, perfect for EVA, wreck salvaging, and other missions. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can treat most wounds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Healing Speed: Medium)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Application Interval: 3s)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(5 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_kit: An individual first aid kit for rapid wound treatment. Standard issue for every soldier. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can treat most wounds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Healing Speed: Fast)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Application Interval: 3s)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(10 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_kit_wound: A small trauma kit that can treat wounds at the fastest speed. The downside is its limited supply of medical items. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can treat most wounds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Healing Speed: Very Fast)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Application Interval: 1.5s)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(5 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_kit_slow: A large medkit containing various medical supplies. Longer application time per use, but higher total healing amount. More suitable for low-intensity combat missions. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can treat most wounds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Healing Speed: Slow)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Application Interval: 10s)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(20 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_kit_grizz: A large medical backpack. Its massive capacity can hold almost any medical supply. Highly favored by Grizzly Squad medics. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can treat most wounds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Occupies backpack slot, can carry many items)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Healing Speed: Very Fast)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Application Interval: 5s)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(10 uses)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Slowly regenerates durability, does not disappear at 0 durability)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(When durability less than 10, application interval becomes 10s)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_surgical_: A surgical toolkit used for removing shrapnel lodged in the body. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can only treat Shrapnel Residue, Fatal Headshot)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Healing Speed: Very Fast)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Application Interval: 3s)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(20 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_tournique: A CAT tourniquet can stop major bleeding. An essential medical supply for every soldier.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_Hemostati: DOC hemostatic agent quickly stops bleeding and can be used multiple times. ‖color:gui.red‖(10 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_medical_ai2: The AI-2 medkit contains various medications, such as broad-spectrum antibiotics, anti-radiation drugs, morphine, painkillers, and other emergency agents. Note: This medkit is designed for emergency use and may have side effects. ‖color:gui.red‖(Contains effects of Broad-Spectrum Antibiotics, Anti-Radiation Drugs, Morphine, Antidote, Paralysis Cure)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant side effects after each use)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(5 uses)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mp7: The MP7 resembles a pistol in appearance. When firing, the shooter can either extend the telescopic stock for shoulder firing or, with training, hold it like a pistol. The MP7 uses 4.6x30mm ammunition, derived by shortening the experimental HK36 assault rifle's 4.6x36mm cartridge. It features low recoil and moderate power. Equipped with a tactical minimap to better understand enemy distribution in outposts. (Reload: 1.2s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1000 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_mp7: Contains 40 rounds of 4.6mm ammunition. Uses Physicorium tips, allowing it to penetrate most armor. Downside is low stopping power. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 0.8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_shotgun: Gain 1 token for each enemy killed during a round. Firing a Deep Diving Armory shotgun consumes one token and grants 50 experience points. (Token count is unlimited, but resets at the end of the round.)
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_shotgun_2: Your mastery of shotguns grows. Killing an enemy grants an additional 50 experience, and the Captain rewards you with 20 Marks!
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_shotgun_3: Nobody on Europa handles a shotgun better than you. When attacking close-range enemies with a Physicorium shotgun, rate of fire increases!
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_doublebarrel: This old relic dates back to the early 19th century. Even now on Europa, people still use this simple and reliable old friend. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 50 experience points for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.6, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_12shell: Shotgun shell loaded with 12 lead pellets. Deadly at close range. ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant damage falloff against targets beyond 9 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Note: Only Deep Diving Armory shotguns have damage falloff at range)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.1) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 1‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Leg Damage, deals 1.5x damage to Deep Diving elite enemies)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_12shell_tigershar: A deadly shotgun shell developed by the Separatists, mixing titanium tips with copper pellets. Due to the severe wounds it inflicts, it's nicknamed "Tigershark" by the Separatist military. ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant damage falloff against targets beyond 9 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Note: Only Deep Diving Armory shotguns have damage falloff at range)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Leg Damage, deals 1.5x damage to Deep Diving elite enemies)‖end‖
