infotexts.entitydescription.deep_12shell_boneshark: An advanced version of the Tigershark ammunition, using Physicorium tips, making it even deadlier. ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant damage falloff against targets beyond 9 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Note: Only Deep Diving Armory shotguns have damage falloff at range)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Leg Damage, deals 1.5x damage to Deep Diving elite enemies)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_12shell_arrow: The top-tier ammunition for 12/70 shotguns. Flechettes have high penetration and can pierce advanced armor plates. ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant damage falloff against targets beyond 9 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Note: Only Deep Diving Armory shotguns have damage falloff at range)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.8) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Leg Damage, deals 1.5x damage to Deep Diving elite enemies)‖end‖‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_slug: Loaded with a single massive 18.4mm slug. A deadly threat at both close and long range. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 6)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_slug_phy: Loaded with a single massive 18.4mm Physicorium slug. A deadly threat at both close and long range. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 7)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_slug_AP: Special AP-20 slug, providing higher armor penetration. (Armor Penetration: 0.8) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_birdshot: BBB grade birdshot loaded with 77 small 4.83mm steel pellets. Excellent for clearing small targets. (Armor Penetration: 0.1) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 1‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_1887: The M1887 shotgun is designed for single-shot lever-action, capable of firing powerful 12 gauge shells. Made of iron and wood, it weighs about 3.6 kg and is about 1.2 meters long. It holds five rounds and uses a lever action to load a new round and eject the spent shell. The lever-action mechanism was a significant innovation at the time, although slower to operate than later pump-action or semi-automatic firearms. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 50 experience points for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 5s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.4, Rate of Fire: 0.8)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m1_garand: The M1 Garand rifle uses a gas-operated system and a rotating bolt locking mechanism. Its feeding system is distinctive: an 8-round en-bloc clip is loaded from the top into the internal magazine. When the last round is fired, the bolt locks open, and the clip is automatically ejected by the ejector, making a characteristic "ping" sound, reminding the soldier to reload. Might clip the soldier's finger. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.3)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_sks: SKS semi-automatic rifle, fires 7.62x39mm intermediate cartridge, fed by a 10-round stripper clip. The 7.62x39mm intermediate round has low recoil and high accuracy. Among Separatists, recruits often train with this rifle. Due to its excellent performance, some veterans still use it. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.3)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_56ban: The Type 56 semi-automatic rifle is a copy of the SKS with some improvements. It features light weight, good accuracy, reliable mechanism, and simple operation. It also has a folding bayonet for close combat in emergencies. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.23)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m14: The M14 uses a wooden stock and metal body structure, operating on a gas-operated principle. While adding a 20-round magazine, it retains the ability to be loaded via stripper clips. Uses 7.62x51mm full-power rounds, large magazine capacity provides sustained firepower. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fn49: The FN-49 semi-automatic rifle is large and heavy, empty weight approx. 4.3kg, length approx. 1117mm. Fires full-power military rifle cartridges. Uses 7.92x57mm Mauser rounds. High power, high accuracy, just a bit cumbersome. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.5, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gew43: The Gew43 rifle uses a short-stroke piston gas system, battle-proven. The locking system is also highly reliable. Uses 7.92x57mm Mauser rounds. Stable firearm, good mobility. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.4, +10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Mosin: The Mosin-Nagant rifle is a bolt-action, internal magazine-fed manual rifle using smokeless powder. Overall length 1020mm, weight 3.9kg, magazine capacity 5 rounds (+1 in chamber). Good accuracy, stable performance. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1.4)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_M1903: The M1903 Springfield rifle uses 7.62mm caliber, overall length 1097mm, empty weight 3.9kg, magazine capacity 5 rounds, rate of fire 10 RPM, effective range 800m. Bolt action mechanism. High power, high accuracy. Downside is slow bolt operation. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1.7)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Lee: The Lee-Enfield rifle, caliber 7.7mm, commonly known as the "British Seven-Seven". Magazine holds ten rounds. Trained veterans can fire 30 rounds per minute. Very fast rate of fire. A deadly weapon in the hands of veterans. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.9)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_type_38: An old Type 38 rifle, holding 5 rounds of 6.5x50mm Arisaka ammunition. Known as the "Type 38" due to its large dust cover. Still in service on Europa due to its low cost. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1.7)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_98k: The famous Kar98k rifle, born 5 centuries ago on Earth. High accuracy. When equipped with a 4x or 6x optical sight, it can be used as an excellent sniper rifle. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1.5, +10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_zhongzheng: The Chiang Kai-shek rifle, modeled after the Mauser Standardmodell rifle, boasts advantages like simple operation, durability, powerful firepower, and good tactical mobility. Although dated, it's more than adequate for sniping enemies. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1.2, +20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_AWM: The AWM sniper rifle has an overall length of 1180mm, barrel length 660mm, uses .338 Lapua Magnum rounds (8.6mm caliber). Although less powerful than 12.7mm sniper rifles, it offers higher mobility and accuracy, making it ideal for precise enemy elimination. (Reload: 2.5s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1.4, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_sr25: The SR-25 DMR uses 7.62x51mm ammunition, overall length 1118mm, superior accuracy. Equipped with a 20-round magazine, it's one of the most popular weapons among security officers. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.3)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m1g_mag: Contains 8 rounds of 7.62x63mm ammunition, suitable for the Garand rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.45) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 6)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Mosin_mag: Contains 5 rounds of 7.62x54Rmm ammunition, for precise shooting with the Mosin-Nagant. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_M1903_mag: Contains 5 rounds of 7.62x63mm ammunition, providing high muzzle velocity for the Springfield. (Armor Penetration: 0.55) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 10)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Lee_mag: Contains 10 rounds of .303 British (7.7mm) ammunition, providing ample rate of fire for the rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 6)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_type_38_mag: Contains 5 rounds of 6.5x50mm Arisaka ammunition, feeding the Type 38 rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 6)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_98k_mag: Contains 5 rounds of 7.92x57mm Mauser ammunition. High accuracy combined with powerful impact. Also usable in the Chiang Kai-shek rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_zhongzheng_mag: Contains 5 rounds of 7.92x57mm Mauser ammunition. High accuracy combined with powerful impact. Also usable in the Kar98k rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 5‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 8)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_sks_mag: Contains 10 rounds of 7.62x39mm rifle ammunition. Balanced performance. Also usable in the Type 56 rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_56ban_mag: Contains 10 rounds of 7.62x39mm rifle ammunition. Balanced performance. Also usable in the SKS rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m14_mag: Contains 20 rounds of 7.62x51mm rifle ammunition, for the M14 rifle. (Armor Penetration: 0.45) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 4)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fn49_mag: Contains 10 rounds of 7.92x57mm rifle ammunition. High power, high accuracy. (Armor Penetration: 0.45) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 7)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gew43_mag: Contains 10 rounds of 7.92x57mm rifle ammunition. Offers significant power and portability. (Armor Penetration: 0.45) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 6)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Lead Reloading Box.)‖end‖

infotexts.entitydescription.deep_dp28: The DP machine gun has a simple structure with only 65 parts, low manufacturing requirements. It uses a gas-operated system with forward impact firing mode, fed by a pan magazine. The pan magazine consists of upper and lower discs clamped together; the upper disc rotates via a spring, continuously feeding bullets to the feed port. Uses 7.62x54mm rifle rounds, providing reliable firepower. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 3s, Spread: 18, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_rpk: Developed from the AKM assault rifle as a squad automatic weapon. Uses a 75-round drum magazine. Empty weight 5.6 kg, sight radius 560 mm. Easy to manufacture, durable, reliable, low failure rate, usable under various harsh conditions, simple weapon operation, rapid sustained fire. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 16, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m60: The M60 machine gun is chambered in 7.62mm, uses a gas-operated system and rotating bolt locking mechanism. The M60 features low weight, compact structure, high firepower, good accuracy, and wide application. Its rate of fire is not high, but accuracy is relatively good, with strong sustained firepower. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 6s, Spread: 16, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 550 RPM, -40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_rpk16: The RPK-16 combines the length of an assault rifle with the firepower of a light machine gun. Its heavy barrel can withstand prolonged continuous fire, providing excellent fire suppression capability. Stable, reliable, resistant to overheating, stable firing. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 3s, Spread: 15, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m249: The M249 uses a new hydraulic-pneumatic recoil buffer to reduce recoil. Features a rotating gas regulator suitable for different firing environments. Fires 5.56x45 ammunition, featuring high rate of fire and high mobility. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 4.5s, Spread: 12, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 800 RPM, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pkp: The PKP GPMG uses a new heavy barrel with longitudinal cooling fins covered by a metal shroud with an integrated carrying handle. This forced air cooling barrel cannot be quickly changed. This design improves barrel cooling efficiency and reduces the probability of PKP malfunction. This machine gun uses 7.62x54R rifle rounds, delivering high damage. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 8s, Spread: 14, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mg42: The MG-42 GPMG is chambered in 7.92mm, firing 7.92x57mm Mauser rifle rounds. Overall length 1219mm, barrel length 533mm. This machine gun has an extremely fast rate of fire. Its tearing sound is the most feared sound by enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 4.5s, Spread: 18, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1200 RPM, -40% Movement Speed)

infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pp19: The Bizon SMG uses the most common blowback operation principle for SMGs. Its most distinctive feature is the 64-round cylindrical magazine made of composite material. Rate of fire is between 650 and 700 RPM. Can use standard and reinforced Makarov pistol rounds. Suitable for various tactical missions. Equipped with a stock made from alien ore strands. In combat, the user seems to ignore pain until the moment of death. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance) (You will not fall in combat)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pp19_warrior: The Vityaz SMG is a modification based on the Bizon SMG, carrying on the Bizon's development philosophy and fully incorporating design elements from the AKS-74U and Bizon-2. Simple structure. Compared to the Bizon SMG, its reliability is greatly improved. (Reload: 1.5s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM) (Provides resistance to water currents) (+15% Movement Speed, Provides Stun and Physical Damage Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_smg_pp19: Contains 64 rounds of 9x19mm ammunition, suitable for the Bizon. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 250%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.pp19_design: A very rare blueprint, allows crafting the Bizon SMG.
infotexts.entitydescription.mg42_design: A very rare blueprint, allows crafting the MG42.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_short_doublebarre: This simple and brutal little guy can fire 12 gauge shells. And you can dual wield them! ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 50 experience points for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m590: The M590 excels in accuracy, reliability, and handling. It provides stable and precise shooting performance, whether in long-range or close-range combat. Its pump-action feeding makes rapid loading and operation more convenient, ensuring continuous firepower output. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 4s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.6, Rate of Fire: 0.8)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m870: As a pump-action shotgun, the M870 offers extremely high performance during building entry assaults or defense. It incorporates many new processes and accessories, such as phosphate surface treatment, ramped front sight, adjustable notch rear sight, and is equipped with an extended tubular magazine holding 7 rounds. Favored by assault soldiers. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun. +20% Rate of Fire when enemies are nearby.)‖end‖ (Reload: 4s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.8, Rate of Fire: 0.8, +15% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_bosg: The BOSG uses a break-action mechanism, holding 2 shotgun shells. Extremely high burst damage at close range. After mastering the reload interval, this shotgun becomes a highly threatening weapon. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 2, Rate of Fire: 0.2)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m4_super90: The M4 Super90 shotgun features a new design called "Auto-Regulating Gas-Operated" (ARGO). Its design includes two symmetrical small stainless steel gas pistons covered by shrouds, greatly enhancing firearm reliability. The Super90 can switch between semi-automatic and pump-action modes, convenient for soldiers accustomed to different firing methods. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 4s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.4, Rate of Fire: 0.5)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_aa12: This big guy fires 12 gauge shells, uses an open-bolt operating mode, provides sustained firepower, fast rate of fire, and low recoil. These features make the AA-12 a devastating weapon for indoor CQB. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 3s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 0.3, -40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_aa12_12shell: Contains 25 rounds of 12 gauge buckshot. Deadly at close range. ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant damage falloff against targets beyond 9 meters)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.4) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 4‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Leg Damage, deals 1.5x damage to Deep Diving elite enemies)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_aa12_slug: Contains 25 Physicorium slugs. Inflicts high damage on distant enemies. (Armor Penetration: 0.7) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.56x45_tit: Armor-piercing rounds using titanium tips. Combined with the 5.56x45mm small caliber, provides good armor penetration effect. (Armor Penetration: 0.65) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_5.56x45_phy: Armor-piercing rounds using Physicorium tips. Possesses the highest penetration power among bullets of the same class. (Armor Penetration: 0.75) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_556x45_M995: 30 rounds of 5.56x45 M995 military armor-piercing ammunition, used by Coalition special forces. Uses Fulgurium chunks as high-energy propellant. (Armor Penetration: 0.85) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Fulgurium Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_556x45_SSA_AP: SSA AP experimental armor-piercing round. Uses Tungsten Physicorium as the tip, capable of penetrating almost any armor. However, this ammunition has extremely high chamber pressure and is prone to causing weapon overheating. (Armor Penetration: 0.95, Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(+100% Weapon Overheat)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 9‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Tungsten Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_556x45_du: Armor-piercing rounds using depleted uranium tips. Inflicts severe radiation sickness on the target, causing slow death. Radiation sickness is extremely dangerous to friendlies, hence equipped with a friendly fire blocker. (Armor Penetration: 0.65) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can penetrate friendly targets, cannot deal damage to friendlies)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Hit creatures suffer -30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Depleted Uranium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_545x39_du: Armor-piercing rounds using depleted uranium tips. Inflicts severe radiation sickness on the target, causing slow death. Radiation sickness is extremely dangerous to friendlies, hence equipped with a friendly fire blocker. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can penetrate friendly targets, cannot deal damage to friendlies)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Hit creatures suffer -30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Depleted Uranium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x39_du: Armor-piercing rounds using depleted uranium tips. Inflicts severe radiation sickness on the target, causing slow death. Radiation sickness is extremely dangerous to friendlies, hence equipped with a friendly fire blocker. (Armor Penetration: 0.65) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can penetrate friendly targets, cannot deal damage to friendlies)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Hit creatures suffer -30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Depleted Uranium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762x51_du: Armor-piercing rounds using depleted uranium tips. Inflicts severe radiation sickness on the target, causing slow death. Radiation sickness is extremely dangerous to friendlies, hence equipped with a friendly fire blocker. (Armor Penetration: 0.65) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can penetrate friendly targets, cannot deal damage to friendlies)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Hit creatures suffer -30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 2)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Depleted Uranium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_127x55_du: Armor-piercing rounds using depleted uranium tips. Inflicts severe radiation sickness on the target, causing slow death. Radiation sickness is extremely dangerous to friendlies, hence equipped with a friendly fire blocker. (Armor Penetration: 0.6) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can penetrate friendly targets, cannot deal damage to friendlies)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Hit creatures suffer -30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Depleted Uranium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_762_expansion: A heavy drum magazine, inconvenient to carry, making the gun heavier and affecting handling. Contains 60 rounds of 7.62x39mm Titanium ammunition, suitable for AK series. (Armor Penetration: 0.6, -15 Weapon Handling, -15% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 6‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1.5)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Titanium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entityname.ak12_blackice: Deep Diving Armory AK-12 Black Ice Paint
infotexts.entitydescription.ak12_blackice: An AK-12 Black Ice paint produced by the Deep Diving company. Exquisite appearance, irresistible to handle.
infotexts.entityname.m82a1_blackice: Deep Diving Armory M82A1 Black Ice Paint
infotexts.entitydescription.m82a1_blackice: An M82A1 Black Ice paint produced by the Deep Diving company. Hold your breath, steady your aim, fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gersuit_female: An officer's uniform from about 5 centuries ago. Exquisitely designed, with multiple pockets. ‖color:gui.blue‖(Beautification Pack: Europa Moe Project)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Do not wear beautification clothes on vanilla characters. Not responsible for eye sores.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.gersuit: An officer's uniform from about 5 centuries ago. Exquisitely designed, with multiple pockets.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ger_hat: A black officer's cap, signifying one's status.
infotexts.entitydescription.green_combat_suit: Standard issue combat suit for Separatist soldiers. Made with Kevlar fabric to reduce the chance of injury from shrapnel. Equipped with 4 pockets for storing combat supplies.
infotexts.entitydescription.brown_combat_suit: Standard issue combat suit for Coalition soldiers. Lightweight and comfortable, equipped with 4 pockets for placing combat supplies.
infotexts.entitydescription.ghost_suit: Custom combat suit for the Ghost Squad. Features high mobility and storage space. Ghost Squad members often wear this suit for infiltration operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.grizzlies_suit: Grizzly Squad custom combat suit. Made with highly waterproof fabric and features additional soft armor inserts, providing ample protection for the Grizzly Squad. ‖color:gui.red‖(When wearing the Grizzly Combat Suit and arm plates are equipped in the body armor, the arms gain an additional 10% damage resistance)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.103_suit: A stylish casual garment. The knitted fabric provides warmth for your journey into the abyss, while the soft Kevlar lining underneath offers basic protection. ‖color:gui.blue‖(Texture provided by: jijk103)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.blue‖(Beautification Pack: Europa Moe Project)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Do not wear beautification clothes on vanilla characters. Not responsible for eye sores.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.103_hat: An exquisite Scottish knit cap, designed to be worn with the Knitted Hoodie. ‖color:gui.blue‖(Texture provided by: jijk103)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.blue‖(Beautification Pack: Europa Moe Project)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Do not wear beautification clothes on vanilla characters. Not responsible for eye sores.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_frost_nova_suit: "Yelena, reporting in. You can also just call me FrostNova." ‖color:gui.blue‖(Texture provided by: Skadi Senpai)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.blue‖(Beautification Pack: Europa Moe Project)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(This clothing can overwrite vanilla textures, will not cause eye sores.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_peach_suit: The lady of Bhava-agra, idle all day, goes wherever the excitement is. ‖color:gui.blue‖(Beautification Pack: Europa Moe Project)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(This clothing can overwrite vanilla textures, will not cause eye sores.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_6b13: The 6B13 is an assault body armor vest with high protection area. The vest has 2 ballistic compartments. From the front chest area, two rear ballistic compartments for placing armor plates, a ballistic collar, and the width of the vest can be adjusted via side straps. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-15% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_6b23: Type 6B23 plate carrier vest, a mid-tier Separatist body armor. It increases the protection area while considering mobility, offering the coverage of heavy armor with less cumbersome ergonomics. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_bagariy: "Bagariy" plate carrier rig, specifically developed by the Separatist research group for their special forces. Its ergonomics far surpass most Separatist armors, providing a high-mobility foundation for special operations. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates)‖end‖ (16 Storage Slots) (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-25% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_defender: "Defender", this body armor is benchmarked against the Coalition's Gen4 heavy armor. However, the Separatists have taken protection a step further, featuring additional arm plate slots and a soft groin plate. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms, Thighs)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates)‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entityname.deep_fort: Fort "Fortress" Full Protection Plate Carrier Vest
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fort: Fort "Fortress", heavy armor developed by the Separatist heavy assault team, drawing from years of combat experience against the Coalition. It features a comprehensive protection design, but its significant drawback is that soldiers cannot operate in it for extended periods. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms, Thighs)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates, Groin Plate)‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entityname.deep_fort_t5: Fort-T5 "Heavy Cavalry" Full Protection Plate Carrier Vest
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fort_t5: Fort "Heavy Cavalry", the final modification of the Fort body armor by the Separatists. It surpasses the old 6B43 model in mobility and represents the culmination of Separatist heavy armor technology. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms, Thighs)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates, Groin Plate)‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_zhuk_6a: Zhuk-6a "Grizzly", custom armor specifically for the Grizzly Squad. It offers strong torso protection and provides high damage reduction when the lining is penetrated. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates)‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Guardian: The Guardian body armor was developed by the Coalition, aiming to reduce weight while protecting vital areas. Offers the protection area of heavy body armor but is lighter. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-25% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_tactec: The TacTec plate carrier rig, standard issue for Coalition soldiers, combines a plate carrier vest with a chest rig, balancing storage and protection. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 2)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (12 Storage Slots) (Can install different plates for corresponding protection)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m1: The M1 plate carrier rig provides soldiers with high plate protection. Storage pouches on the rig can hold spare ammunition. Favored by Separatist soldiers. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 2)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (12 Storage Slots) (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_osprey: The Osprey heavy plate carrier rig, favored by Coalition special forces, integrates protection, mobility, and carrying capacity, providing the best plate carrier rig for special operators. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates)‖end‖ (16 Storage Slots) (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Obsidian: "Obsidian" heavy plate carrier rig, the Coalition's effective response to Separatist heavy armor. Coalition soldiers focus more on ergonomics; their plate carrier rigs are lighter and more practical compared to the Separatists'. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms, Thighs)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.75)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates)‖end‖ (16 Storage Slots) (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.gen4_heavy: Coalition's fourth-generation plate carrier vest. Modular and fully scalable, the GEN4 can easily be modified for enhanced protection. This version is enhanced with hand protection, and the inner lining is replaced with stronger Aramid plates. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates)‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_6b43: Type 6B43 Class 6A heavy body armor. Ultra-heavy body armor developed by the Separatists for high-risk missions, offering extreme protection. Generally issued to Separatist elite heavy troopers. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms, Thighs)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Additional Support: Arm Plates, Groin Plate)‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection) (-40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_hpc: A plate carrier made from active fiber. Provides no protection itself; relies entirely on inserted plates. Its advantage lies in low cost and minimal impact on shooter mobility. (Protection Area: Torso) (+20% Movement Speed) (Can install different plates for corresponding protection)
infotexts.entitydescription.thor: A black integrated plate carrier vest. Almost no impact on movement speed. Built-in ballistic fibers defend against small shrapnel and small caliber rounds. Additionally, plates can be installed for higher protection levels. ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lining Protection Level: 2)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (Can install different plates for corresponding protection)
infotexts.entitydescription.tanzan_m22: The M22 chest rig is designed for operators. Made of non-absorbent fabric, it has 12 storage slots for magazines, medical kits, grenades, etc. (+10% Movement Speed) (12 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_commando: Commando chest rig, common among Coalition security forces. Initially designed for riot control, so ammunition capacity is limited. (+10% Movement Speed) (12 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_alpha: The Alpha chest rig offers large capacity and portability. Made of waterproof fabric, it's a well-balanced rig in all aspects. (16 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_coalition: Coalition chest rig, standard issue for Coalition military. The war between the Coalition and Separatists has lasted decades, only the Coalition chest rig remains unchanged. (16 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_separatists: The Separatists chest rig was developed over years of fighting the Coalition. It can hold a large amount of ammunition and features high ergonomics. (-10% Movement Speed) (24 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mk3: MK3 chest rig, high capacity, provides the shooter with sustained firepower and ample medical supplies. (-10% Movement Speed) (24 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m43: M43 chest rig, black concealed type. Can carry a certain amount of ammunition. (+10% Movement Speed) (12 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Ghost: Ghost chest rig, lightweight and comfortable, favored by infiltration units. (16 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_thunder: Thunder chest rig. When you need to carry a large amount of combat supplies, the Thunder chest rig is your good partner. (-10% Movement Speed) (24 Storage Slots, Occupies Backpack Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_bb102: BB-102 assault backpack, standard issue for Separatist soldiers. 16-liter capacity, equipped with adjustable straps. Can hold most combat items. (24 Storage Slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_t20: T20 assault backpack, common among Coalition soldiers. High portability and some storage space. (20 Storage Slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_t30: T30 medium backpack is an upgraded version of the T20. Maximizes storage space without affecting ergonomics. Highly praised among Coalition soldiers. (30 Storage Slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_t30_black: Black version of the T30 medium backpack. More discreet. (30 Storage Slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ghost_bag: Standard issue backpack for the Ghost Squad. Small and lightweight. (20 Storage Slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_attack2: The Attack-2 backpack can carry a large amount of items. The backpack features an expandable main compartment, two side pockets, a pocket on the front, two pockets formed between the main compartment and side pockets, and a top flap with a zippered pocket. (-20% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling) (36 Storage Slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_6sh118: 6sh118 heavy backpack, featuring the largest storage space. Main pack 60 liters, with 20 liters of additional space on each side. Can carry back everything you encounter. (-40% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling) (48 Storage Slots, can hold anything)
infotexts.entitydescription.6b47: The 6B47 is a Kevlar helmet. Ballistic performance is the same as its predecessor, but lighter, even buoyant. The 6B47 helmet features a modular design. A Picatinny rail on the right side allows users to attach flashlights, identification lights, etc. The central mount can be used to install night vision devices or camera equipment. ‖color:gui.green‖(20% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(No face shield, Protection Level 0)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install tactical equipment)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_kiver_m: The Fort heavy helmet was developed by the Separatist heavy assault team. Its unique multi-component protective structure can fully absorb the impact energy of bullets transmitted to the head and cervical spine. The double-layer ballistic face shield provides good protection against small caliber rounds. Downside is incompatibility with headsets. ‖color:gui.green‖(40% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖‖color:gui.red‖Overmatched by bullets with ≥6 penetration, ricochet chance ignored‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Head)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot wear headset)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_zsh_1_2_m: The ZSH-1-2M "Volga" helmet, produced by the Separatists, takes protection to the next level. It has received consistently high praise from high-ranking Separatist soldiers. Although incompatible with headsets, its high protection level masks this flaw. ‖color:gui.green‖(50% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖‖color:gui.red‖Overmatched by bullets with ≥7 penetration, ricochet chance ignored‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Head)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot wear headset)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_altyn: The Altyn heavy helmet achieves extreme protection. The downside is its heavier weight, significant impact on ergonomics, and considerable restriction of vision. ‖color:gui.green‖(70% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖‖color:gui.red‖Overmatched by bullets with ≥9 penetration, ricochet chance ignored‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖(Visor up: Protection Level 0, no ricochet chance)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Head)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot wear headset)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Fearless_Vanguard: Fearless Vanguard Class 5A ballistic helmet. The latest heavy ballistic helmet from the Separatists. Features a 3-layer Class 5A ballistic face shield, maximizing protection without compromising vision. Downside is its heavier weight, still significantly impacting ergonomics. ‖color:gui.green‖(60% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖‖color:gui.red‖Overmatched by bullets with ≥8 penetration, ricochet chance ignored‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Head)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.08)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot wear headset)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_maska: Maska heavy helmet. A heavy helmet pursuing extreme protection. Impeccable in terms of protection, but at a great cost. ‖color:gui.green‖(80% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖‖color:gui.red‖Overmatched by bullets with ≥9 penetration, ricochet chance ignored‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖(Visor up: Protection Level 0, no ricochet chance)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Head)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot wear headset)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fast_helmet: The FAST helmet features ARC rails on both sides for users to attach flashlights, noise-canceling headsets, communication equipment, etc., and a central mount for installing night vision devices or camera equipment via adapters. ‖color:gui.green‖(20% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(No face shield, Protection Level 0)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install tactical equipment)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fast_helmet_black: Black painted FAST helmet. More discreet. ‖color:gui.green‖(20% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(No face shield, Protection Level 0)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install tactical equipment)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_fast_helmet_ghost: Ghost Squad custom helmet. Anti-glare goggles + Ghost mask. Not many see them and live to tell the tale. ‖color:gui.green‖(25% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(No face shield, Protection Level 0)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install tactical equipment)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment upgrades)‖end‖

Ghost Squad custom helmet. Built-in headset function and equipped with a high-hardness ballistic face shield. ‖color:gui.green‖(50% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖‖color:gui.red‖Overmatched by bullets with ≥7 penetration, ricochet chance ignored‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Head)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot wear headset)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Neural Adjustment, Auxiliary upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalgoggles_t7: T7 thermal imager, mounted on the helmet, provides the shooter with the best thermal vision, revealing enemy distributions. ‖color:gui.red‖(Mounts on helmet)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Thermal Range: 30 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Turn off tactical equipment button to swap)‖end‖
infotexts.entityname.gpnvg_18: GPNVG-18 Quad-Eye Night Vision Goggles (Tactical Equipment)
infotexts.entitydescription.gpnvg_18: GPNVG-18 quad-eye night vision goggles, mounted on the helmet, allow seeing in the darkest abyss, leaving enemies hidden in the dark nowhere to hide. ‖color:gui.red‖(Mounts on helmet)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Turn off tactical equipment button to swap)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_healthscan_helmet: SCAN-4 monocular medical display, allows quick checking of a patient's condition, enabling doctors to prescribe the right treatment. ‖color:gui.red‖(Mounts on helmet)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Turn off tactical equipment button to swap)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_8x_telescope: Scout telescope, produced by Deep Diving Armory company. Features 1-8x zoom, helping scouts quickly gather enemy information. ‖color:gui.red‖(Requires Lua: Provides extreme range bonus when aiming down sights (RMB))‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Use Mouse Wheel to zoom)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_handheldstatusmon: A monitor capable of displaying ruin status.
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_helmet: A simple helmet made from steel bars, providing basic protection. ‖color:gui.green‖(25% chance of ricochet, head takes no damage)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(No face shield, Protection Level 0)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.shotgun_ammo_bag: A side saddle allows faster reloading of shotgun shells, enhancing the sustained firepower of pump-action shotguns. (Allows loading 2 shells at once)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_supernova: A specially modified shotgun equipped with a suppressor. 7-round magazine capacity, fires 12 gauge shells. Knocks down enemies at close range while making minimal noise. ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 4s, Spread: 0.1, Damage Multiplier: 1.5, Rate of Fire: 0.7)
infotexts.entityname.deep_vhs_d3_baka: ‖color:gui.blue‖"Law and Ordnance" VHS-D3‖end‖ Bullpup Assault Rifle
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_vhs_d3_baka: Baka's exclusive weapon, from Battlefield 2042. The elusive Baka used this gun to collect numerous dog tags. (Reload: 1.2s, Spread: 1, Damage Multiplier: 1.1, Rate of Fire: 0.075) (Provides water current resistance, physical damage resistance, +20% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Built-in 3x scope magnification)‖end‖ (Equipped with tactical minimap)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_wuchuan: MiaoMiao's exclusive weapon. The powerful MiaoMiao used the 'Parry Stick Flow' to flawlessly defeat Teacher Yin Hu, obtaining this copper-poured, iron-cast great blade. ‖color:gui.blue‖(When the Wuchuan (Dark Wind) rises, retreat to survive, advance to conquer. Can block with the blade, or dash forward like the wind. Right-click to charge stance. Enemy attacks on Wuchuan accelerate the charge. When the charge bar is full, activate Swift Step (Sata). Swift Step: 90% Stun Resistance, +70% Movement Speed, 100% Water Current Resistance, +200% Melee Damage, +100% Melee Speed. Effect diminishes over time. Ride the Wind: While crouching, +300% Melee Speed, 80% Damage Resistance. Leaf Concealment: When health is below 50% while crouching, gain Concealment. Enemies cannot detect you.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Gauss_Benzoyl_Per: Benzoyl Peroxide's exclusive weapon, from S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2. This Gauss Rifle from the Zone will pierce all armor. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 0, Damage Multiplier: 1, Charge Time: 2.5s) ‖color:gui.red‖(Hold Left Mouse Button to fire)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pigcat_three_shot: Jiazi's exclusive weapon, from GTFO. A large-caliber shotgun with three barrels. Its exaggerated projectile design and recoil that completely disregards the wrist seem to indicate this weapon exists solely to tear apart enemies in front of it. Numerous dents and scratches on the exterior speak of past hellish combat environments, but the internal structure is surprisingly well-maintained, without any signs of operational issues. Garganta is a nightmare of the past, but now, can I entrust my life to you once more? ‖color:gui.red‖(Gain 100 experience points and 20 Marks for each enemy killed with this shotgun.)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 10, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 1, -40% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_three_mag: Exclusive magazine for the Triple-Barrel Shotgun. Delivers devastating impact to close-range targets. ‖color:gui.red‖(Significant damage falloff against targets beyond 9 meters)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Only Deep Diving Armory shotguns have distance falloff)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.9, Shrapnel Residue: 20) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 9‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_rpd_thesun: YaoYang's exclusive weapon, from COD. An RPD with a rapid-cooling barrel, delivering strong fire suppression to enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖(-70% Spread while crouched with a machine gun.)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Exclusive cooling barrel, no reload penalty)‖end‖ (Jam Clear: 6s, Spread: 8, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM, -20% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_rpd_mag_sun: Cloudburst exclusive drum magazine. High armor penetration, provides continuous fire suppression. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can suppress enemies, reducing enemy firing accuracy by 60%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reduces enemy Gun Damage Resistance by 30%)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.8) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 8‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_sa58_sheep: YangPai's exclusive weapon, texture from Arena Breakout. Customized SA58 assault rifle, using 7.62x51mm ammunition, paired with a 40-round large drum magazine, providing powerful firepower. ‖color:gui.red‖(Built-in 1-3x scope)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Built-in laser sight)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Stealth: -50% Monster Detection and Hearing Range)‖end‖ (Reload: 2.2s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 700 RPM, +10% Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mk17_peach: TaoMao's exclusive weapon. A battle-hardened MK17 battle rifle. Many scratches on the body, but the internals are well-maintained. "Time to move out, old friend. The abyss awaits us..." ‖color:gui.red‖(Equipped with tactical minimap)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Built-in repair tools)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 600 RPM)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gauss_mag: Gauss Rifle magazine, holding 10 rounds of Tungsten Physicorium ammunition, capable of piercing any armor. ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 400%)‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 1.0) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 10)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 10‖end‖ (Can penetrate doors and walls) ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 20)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Recoverable for reloading)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_74m_103: jijk103's exclusive weapon. An AK74M using the B-10M handguard. Pure black body, highly customizable. ‖color:gui.red‖(Unaffected by 7N39 bullet overheating)‖end‖ (Reload: 2s, Spread: 2, Damage Multiplier: 1.2, Rate of Fire: 650 RPM) (Features 3 upgrade slots)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_meteorite: Mark's exclusive weapon, from Arknights - Meteorite's skin "Graphite". A burst-fire grenade launcher cannon. (Reload: 3s, Spread: 3, Damage Multiplier: 1, Rate of Fire: 2.8, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_556x45_vhs: Contains 30 rounds of 5.56x45mm ammunition, exclusive magazine for the VHS-D3. (Armor Penetration: 0.75) ‖color:gui.red‖(Penetration Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Can penetrate Protection Level 7‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Headshot Multiplier: 200%)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Lethal Headshot: 1)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Reload using Deep Diving Armory Ammo Loader, requires Physicorium Reloading Box.)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_meteorite_mag: Contains 5 rounds of 40mm high-explosive warheads. Large explosion radius, maintain safe distance. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.5) ‖color:gui.red‖(Recoverable for reloading)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m79: An old grenade launcher, holding one 40mm grenade. Requires reloading after each shot. A good choice against swarm tactics. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 5, Damage Multiplier: 2, -30% Movement Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_gl40: The GL40 fires 40x46mm grenades. To load, the barrel swings to the left, exposing the breech. Besides the standard leaf sight, various sights and scopes can be attached via Picatinny rails on the sides and top. Highly portable. This version comes with a grip for standalone firing. (Reload: 2s, Spread: 4, Damage Multiplier: 1.5)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m32: The M32 revolving grenade launcher is a 6-shot, semi-automatic launcher. Combat rate of fire is 6 rounds / 3 seconds. Extremely high burst firepower for saturation bombardment of enemies. (Reload: 8s, Spread: 12, Damage Multiplier: 2, Rate of Fire: 0.5, 6-round cylinder)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_40mmgrenade_he: 40mm high-explosive grenade. Short fuse, lower damage compared to other grenades. Fire from a safe distance. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Armor Penetration: 0.5, Instant Fuse)
infotexts.entitydescription.vhs_d3_baka_design: Extremely hard to find VHS-D3 blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.74m_103_design: Extremely hard to find AK74M blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.ar15_50_xiaohua_design: Extremely hard to find AR-15 .50 (Peacekeeper) blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.meteorite_design: Extremely hard to find "Meteor" blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.three_shotgun_design: Extremely hard to find Triple-Barrel Shotgun blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.rpd_thesun_design: Extremely hard to find "Cloudburst" RPD blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.sa58_sheep_design: Extremely hard to find special SA58 blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.mk17_peach_design: Extremely hard to find special MK17 blueprint. Craft its special firearm at the workbench.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ssd: A precious solid state drive. May contain blueprints for firearms and equipment. Usually kept by leaders.
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_plate_arm: Small plate specifically for arm protection. Can be installed in body armor with corresponding slots. (Steel plates never break, but are heavy) (-30% Damage Taken, -30% Bleeding, -30% Stun, -30% Shrapnel Residue) (-10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_plate_groin: Small plate specifically for groin protection. Can be installed in body armor with corresponding slots. (Steel plates never break, but are heavy) (-30% Damage Taken, -30% Bleeding, -30% Stun, -30% Shrapnel Residue) (-5 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_plate_1: Ballistic plate made from steel bars. Light steel defends against ‖color:gui.red‖Lead Low-Penetration Rounds‖end‖ damage. Poor resistance against armor-piercing ammunition. (Steel plates never break, but are heavy) (-30% Damage Taken, -30% Bleeding, -30% Stun, -30% Shrapnel Residue) (-20% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_plate_2: Double-layer plate made from higher-performance Grade 45 steel. Provides good ballistic protection against ‖color:gui.red‖Titanium Bullets‖end‖. Downside is greater sacrifice in mobility. "With our current technology, we can only improve ballistic protection by adding more material. It's a reluctant necessity..." (Steel plates never break, but are heavy) (-60% Damage Taken, -60% Bleeding, -60% Stun, -60% Shrapnel Residue) (-40% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.steel_plate_3: Steel plate made from 3 layers of extreme-protection heavy armor steel. Completely sacrifices mobility for extreme protection. One of the few plates that can face ‖color:gui.red‖Physicorium Ammunition‖end‖ directly. (Steel plates never break, but are heavy) (-80% Damage Taken, -80% Bleeding, -80% Stun, -80% Shrapnel Residue) (-80% Movement Speed, -40 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.ceramics_plate_1: Ceramic plate primarily made of alumina. Alumina has higher density, lower hardness, is easy to process, and cheap. Very suitable for entry-level ceramic plates. (Ceramic plates absorb damage; character takes no damage before shattering. Requires repair after breaking.) (Absorbs ‖color:gui.red‖100‖end‖ damage before shattering. Plate is broken when the ‖color:gui.red‖health bar stops pulsing‖end‖.) (-30% Stun, Bleeding, Shrapnel Residue) (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.ceramics_plate_2: Ceramic plate primarily made of silicon carbide. Silicon carbide has medium density, medium hardness, and a moderate price increase. Good cost-performance ratio, very suitable for mid-tier ceramic plates. (Ceramic plates absorb damage; character takes no damage before shattering. Requires repair after breaking.) (Absorbs ‖color:gui.red‖200‖end‖ damage before shattering. Plate is broken when the ‖color:gui.red‖health bar stops pulsing‖end‖.) (-60% Stun, Bleeding, Shrapnel Residue) (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.ceramics_plate_3: Ceramic plate primarily made of boron carbide. Boron carbide has low density, high hardness. Downside is difficult processing and high price. Low cost-performance ratio, but provides high-level protection. (Ceramic plates absorb damage; character takes no damage before shattering. Requires repair after breaking.) (Absorbs ‖color:gui.red‖300‖end‖ damage before shattering. Plate is broken when the ‖color:gui.red‖health bar stops pulsing‖end‖.) (-80% Stun, Bleeding, Shrapnel Residue) (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.KEVLAR: ‖color:gui.red‖(Craft in Chemical Reaction Chamber)‖end‖ Kevlar fiber features low density, high strength, good toughness, high temperature resistance, easy processing and shaping. Density is only one-fifth of steel. Generally used for making body armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_assistant: Who knows what you'll get? Take a gamble, turn your bicycle into a motorbike!
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_weapon_container: Deep Diving Armory special weapon crate, specifically designed to store a large number of weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_trash_can: Deep Diving Armory special trash can, specifically designed to dispose of annoying junk. (Place using Right Mouse Button + E)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_thermal_interfere: A thermal imaging jammer specially made by the Ghost Squad. Will disable thermal imaging within a certain nearby range for a period of time.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ammo_container: Deep Diving Armory special ammo crate, specifically designed to store a large amount of ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_accessory_contain: Deep Diving Armory special accessory crate. No, not computer accessories.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_explosive_contain: Deep Diving Armory special explosives crate. Prepare to blast the enemy to the surface.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_cloth_container: Deep Diving Armory special wardrobe. The Deep Diving Home, every crew member's choice. (Place using Right Mouse Button + E)
infotexts.entitydescription.turtle_soup: Incomparably delicious turtle soup. Made with aged female turtles as the base. Drinking it increases FPS by 3 times, freeing you from server rollback torture (fantasy).
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_pirate_exosuit: An exosuit privately modified by pirates. Added extra Aramid plates to prevent shrapnel residue. ‖color:gui.red‖(Pirate exosuit never breaks, but mobility is poor)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Area: Torso, Arms, Thighs, Shins, Feet)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_pirate_b: "Pirate activity has increased recently. According to reconnaissance reports, pirate traces have been found at [location1]. Nearby fleets are summoned for elimination. The Coalition will rebuild the outpost. Do not destroy the outpost with ship turrets; violators will be severely punished!\nYou must nip this pirate site in the bud before it develops further. The Europa Coalition will not be stingy with rewards for fleets completing the mission. Move out, nearby fleets!" ‖color:gui.green‖PigCat Senpai Support Chance‖end‖: 50% ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel‖end‖: 8 hostiles: 1 Leader, 2 Soldiers, 2 Assault Troopers, 3 Recruits. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 1 additional Heavy. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ Equipped with WW2 weapons + low-penetration ammo. A few wear body armor (no plates) + ballistic helmets. ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_destory_pirate_base_: "Not a single pirate left. Well done. Here is your reward."
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_pirate_base_: "Re-summoning new fleets to eliminate the pirates. Erase the names of the previously failed fleets. We can't tarnish the Coalition's reputation; this is crucial for us."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_destory_pirate_base: "Good work everyone. Take a moment to rest, then we move out."
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_pirate_b: "According to the latest intelligence, a pirate site has been discovered at [location1]. Nearby fleets are summoned for elimination. The Coalition will rebuild the outpost. Do not destroy the outpost with ship turrets; violators will be severely punished!\nThis site is a pirate relay station. Destroy it. The Europa Coalition will not be stingy with rewards for fleets completing the mission. Move out, nearby fleets!" ‖color:gui.green‖PigCat Senpai Support Chance‖end‖: 50% ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles: 2 Leaders, 2 Renegade Soldiers, 2 Assault Troopers. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 3 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ Most use steel firearms, including rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns. Most equipped with body armor (no plates) + ballistic helmets. ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_destory_pirate_base_: "Pirate site cleared. Well done. Here is your reward."
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_pirate_base_: "Re-summoning new fleets to eliminate the pirates. Erase the names of the previously failed fleets. We can't tarnish the Coalition's reputation; this is crucial for us."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_destory_pirate_base: "Good work everyone. Check ammo and medical supplies. Take a moment to rest, then we move out."
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_pirate_b: "According to the latest intelligence, a long-established pirate fortress has been discovered at [location1]. Nearby fleets are summoned for elimination. The Coalition will rebuild the outpost. Do not destroy the outpost with ship turrets; violators will be severely punished!\nThis site is the pirates' main nest. Destroy it to weaken the nearby pirate forces. The Europa Coalition will not be stingy with rewards for fleets completing the mission. Move out, nearby fleets!" ‖color:gui.green‖PigCat Senpai Support Chance‖end‖: 50% ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles: 1 Leader, 2 Heavy Defenders, 2 Renegade Soldiers, 1 Assault Trooper. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 3 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ Most use steel firearms. Beware of their large caliber weapons, possibly anti-materiel rifles. Most equipped with body armor (with plates) + ballistic helmets, some equipped with exoskeletons. ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Debuff Details Night: Outpost has no lights‖end‖
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_destory_pirate_base_: "Pirate nest cleared. Well done. Here is your reward."
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_pirate_base_: "Re-summoning new fleets to eliminate the pirates. Erase the names of the previously failed fleets. We can't tarnish the Coalition's reputation; this is crucial for us."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_destory_pirate_base: "Good work everyone. Check ammo and medical supplies. We need to rest for a while."
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_mine_saltpeter_m: Saltpeter deposits are rumored to be located in the passage between [location1] and [location2]. It's one of the essential raw materials for making gunpowder. Please bring back 8 saltpeter samples to verify the mineral deposit.
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_mine_saltpeter_mine: Sufficient saltpeter samples have been mined. Return them to the outpost for payment.
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_mine_saltpeter_miner: Your efforts confirm the presence of saltpeter.
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_mine_sulfur_mine: Sulfur deposits are rumored to be located in the passage between [location1] and [location2]. It's one of the essential raw materials for making gunpowder. Please bring back 8 sulfur samples to verify the mineral deposit.
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_mine_sulfur_mineral: Sufficient sulfur samples have been mined. Return them to the outpost for payment.
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_mine_sulfur_mineral: Your efforts confirm the presence of sulfur.
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_clear_wreck: "We recently lost contact with a transport ship. Go check the situation. We won't let you run errands for nothing."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_clear_wreck: "So it was the Thalamus's doing. Looks like we need to develop new herbicides."
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_clear_husk_beaco: "Captain, sonar shows an abandoned beacon station nearby. Horrifying sounds are coming from inside... Maybe Crawlers?" "Ready your weapons. Let's go check it out. I heard this story countless times as a child. There are no Crawlers on Europa."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_clear_husk_beacon: Crawlers don't exist. Hearing strange noises on Europa? Husks are more likely.
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_clear_husk_ruin: "Strange noises are coming from the usually silent ruins! Follow Europa Radio Broadcast to uncover the truth."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_clear_husk_ruin: "I don't like these kinds of broadcasts. They're just exaggerating to attract attention."
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_beacon_fight_1: "One of our beacon stations has been illegally occupied by pirates. They stole weapons from Coalition fleets. Go eliminate those robbers!" ‖color:gui.red‖(The pirates stole the Coalition's classified hard drive. Maybe check their safe?)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Please do not accept pirate ship elimination missions simultaneously, it may cause bugs.)‖end‖
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_beacon_fight_1: Enemy beacon station detected. Prepare for boarding action!
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_beacon_fight_2: "The Separatists have successfully captured one of our Kättingrad outposts. This outpost serves a crucial role as a supply station in the center of the route. We must retake it!" ‖color:gui.red‖(The Separatists obtained the Coalition's classified hard drive. Maybe check their safe?)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Please do not accept pirate ship elimination missions simultaneously, it may cause bugs.)‖end‖
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_beacon_fight_2: Enemy outpost detected. Prepare for boarding action!
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_f1: F1 heavy grenade, nicknamed "Big Lemon". Cast iron body, weighs 600g, contains 60g TNT explosive. Effective kill radius approx. 30 meters. Short throwing distance, extremely powerful fragmentation effect. After throwing, run as far away as possible. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Press E to cook) (4s fuse, Short throw distance, Large explosion radius)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m67: M67 fragmentation grenade, standard issue for Coalition forces. Very large explosion radius, fragments remain lethal to distant enemies. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Press E to cook) (5s fuse, Medium throw distance, Very large explosion radius)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m18: M18 smoke grenade. Quickly releases smoke after throwing, covering friendly retreat. (Press E to cook) (2s fuse, Medium throw distance, Small explosion radius) ‖color:gui.red‖(Standing in smoke: Gain 50% Gunshot Wound and Headshot Resistance, +25% Spread)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Smoke duration: 15s)‖end‖
