infotexts.entitydescription.deep_RGD5: RGD-5 offensive grenade, standard issue for Separatists. Smaller explosion radius, shorter fuse. Belongs to offensive grenades. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Press E to cook) (2s fuse, Medium throw distance, Small explosion radius)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_RGO: RGO impact grenade. Features an impact fuse for instant detonation. This grenade is prone to friendly fire, maintain safe distance. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Impact fuse, Long throw distance, Very small explosion radius)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_Cluster: A grenade made by bundling multiple grenades together. Simultaneous explosion of several grenades delivers devastating impact, but note the very short throwing distance. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Press E to cook) (8s fuse, Very short throw distance, Very large explosion radius, Devastating explosion)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m24: A relatively old stick grenade. Cheap to produce, its special shape allows for long throwing distance. Explosion radius is smaller compared to other grenades. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Press E to cook) (2s fuse, Very long throw distance, Small explosion radius)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_claymore: Point "THIS SIDE TOWARDS ENEMY" towards the likely direction of enemy approach, find a quiet corner, and wait for the enemy to be blown to pieces! Warning: Claymore mines are indiscriminate. Hopefully, no unlucky assistant steps on one. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Press E to place or disarm) ‖color:gui.red‖(Flip the switch to arm. Do not remove the Claymore from inventory while the switch is on.)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Do not place under character's feet when arming. Maintain safe distance when disarming.)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(For your safety, do not arm the Claymore while running.)‖end‖ (Small explosion radius, High lethality)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ied: An improvised explosive made from C4. Throw it out, then dial the phone to detonate. Don't underestimate it; its explosive yield can launch a car into the sky. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can stick to anything)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Can only be detonated by IED Remote)‖end‖ (Short throw distance, Small explosion radius, Extremely high lethality)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ied_ammo: An improvised explosive made from C4. Throw it out, then dial the phone to detonate. Don't underestimate it; its explosive yield can launch a car into the sky. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Shrapnel Residue resistance‖end‖ (Short throw distance, Small explosion radius, Extremely high lethality)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_ied_remote: Beep beep beep! Boom!!! ‖color:gui.red‖(Can detonate all nearby IEDs not in inventory)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_f1_weapon: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m67_weapon: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_rgd5_weapon: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m24_weapon: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_stun_grenade_weap: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_cluster_weapon: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m18_weapon: A grenade that can be thrown by enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_stun_grenade: Non-lethal grenade. Provides better control effect than conventional flashbangs. Mixed with graphite powder for an EMP effect. Ideal for apprehending enemies. ‖color:gui.green‖Go Prone: Hold Spacebar to go prone, gaining 90% Stun and Flash resistance‖end‖ (Press E to cook) (2s fuse, Medium throw distance, Medium explosion radius)
infotexts.eventtext.deep_reinforce_end.c1: "Don't let your guard down, more enemies are about to enter the outpost. Prepare to engage!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pirate_reinforce_20min.c1: "According to Coalition intelligence, enemy pirate reinforcements will join the battle in 20 minutes. Finish this quickly!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pirate_reinforce_20min.c2: "Reporting, sir, enemy reinforcements will enter the outpost in 10 seconds!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_separatists_reinforce_20m: "Separatist reinforcements will join the battle in 20 minutes. Finish this quickly!"
"Reporting, sir, the main Separatist force will enter the outpost in 10 seconds!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_coalition_reinforce_20min: "Coalition reinforcements will join the battle in 20 minutes. Finish this quickly!"
"Reporting, sir, the main Coalition force will enter the outpost in 10 seconds!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_ghost_reinforce_20min.c1: "Listen up, Separatist forces! The Coalition has sent another elite Ghost Squad for support. Eliminate them within 20 minutes!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_ghost_reinforce_20min.c2: "The veteran Ghost Squad will join the fight in 10 seconds. Retreat now!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_grizzlies_reinforce_20min: "This is Captain of the Grizzly Squad. Comrades holding the outpost, hang in there! We will arrive to support you in 20 minutes!"
"The legendary Captain of the Grizzly Squad will join the fight in 10 seconds. Retreat now!"
"I have received orders from the Deep Diving Armory's armed department to support the juniors. I will join the battle in 3 minutes!"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcatman_reinforce.c1: "Bring it on! Bullets to the chest! (Pre-battle declaration)"
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_easy.mine: "Running a bit low on gunpowder lately."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_easy.mine2: "There's a Saltpeter and Sulfur deposit nearby. Go dig up 10, or maybe 9 of them."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_easy.money: "Running a bit short on cash lately."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_easy.wangdao: "Looks like it's the royal road for me after all..."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_easy.c1: "Hello, this is Deep Diving Armory PigCat Squad, offering royal road missions."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_medium.mine: "Running a bit low on gunpowder lately."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_medium.mine2: "There's a Saltpeter and Sulfur deposit nearby. Go dig up 10, or maybe 9 of them."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_medium.money: "Running a bit short on cash lately."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_medium.wangdao: "Looks like it's the royal road for me after all..."
infotexts.eventtext.deep_pigcat_medium.c1: "Hello, this is Deep Diving Armory PigCat Squad, offering royal road missions."
infotexts.missionname.deep_destory_separatist_base: Eliminate Remnant Separatist Forces (Moderate) (Possible Debuff: Night)
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_separati: "Damn Separatists seized our outpost! These separatists are a plague on Europa! According to the last communication from the site, the main Separatist force has been eliminated, leaving behind regular soldiers. Your mission is to take them out and regain control of the outpost. Separatists are formally trained military, unlike those pirates. Proceed with caution." ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles: 1 Soldier, 1 Striker, 2 Heavy Defenders, 1 Sniper, 1 Grenadier. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 4 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ Use rifles, shotguns, SMGs, sniper rifles, grenade launchers. All equipped with body armor (with plates) + ballistic helmets. Some enemies have Tier 2 plates. ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Debuff Details Night: Outpost has no lights‖end‖

"Intel indicates: The main Separatist force has occupied a Coalition site. As a Separatist army, they are no match for those pirates. Prepare thoroughly. I have a bad feeling about this..." ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles: Leader, Blaster, Sniper, Heavy Defender, Striker, Grenadier. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 4 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Debuff Details Night: Outpost has no lights‖end‖
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_grizzlie: "Captain, we have successfully taken the area. Coalition reinforcements have all been eliminated." "Those Coalition bastards are really stubborn. Count ammo and personnel, we're moving to the next site." "But before that, another sub has docked at the outpost. Prepare to welcome our guests, soldiers. It's time to give them a proper 'reception'!" ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 4 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Warning: This mission is extremely difficult. As the highest difficulty in Deep Diving, engage with caution.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Debuff Details Night: Outpost has no lights‖end‖
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_coalitio: "The Coalition forces just seized one of our outposts. We must prevent them from establishing a military blockade here! The Separatists are the future of Europa!" ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: 4 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖1 wave of reinforcements after killing everyone, 1 wave of strong reinforcements 20 minutes after the mission starts.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Debuff Details Night: Outpost has no lights‖end‖
infotexts.missiondescription.deep_destory_ghost_ba: The GHOST Squad, the Coalition's covert infiltration unit, excels in stealth and assassination. Their CQB capabilities are also on par with Separatist forces. "The Coalition sent the Ghost Squad to capture this outpost. Our garrison and reinforcements were wiped out. This outpost is extremely important to the Separatists. We must retake it." "I am the commander of the Separatist forces. I've heard about your fleet's past victories against Coalition troops. We can only rely on you now. Upon success, you will be handsomely rewarded." "For the future of Europa!" ‖color:gui.red‖Warning: This mission is extremely difficult. Ensure you have successfully completed Coalition Hard missions before attempting this.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Enemy Intel (Additional elite enemies appear in multiplayer)‖end‖: 6 hostiles. ‖color:gui.red‖Multiplayer Intel‖end‖: Adds 4 additional elite enemies. ‖color:gui.red‖Expect one reinforcement wave after clearing the area, and a second, heavy wave at the 20-minute mark.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not redock to attack the outpost; due to the vanilla game mechanics, enemies will rush your submarine directly.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Do not use ship turrets.‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Debuff Details Night: Outpost has no lights‖end‖
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_destory_ghost_base_h: "The Ghost Squad is wiped out! This is a major blow to the Coalition!"
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_ghost_base_h: "Damn it, looks like we have to cede this outpost to those Coalition bastards..."
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_grizzlies_ba: "Confiscate their equipment. We're moving on to the next Coalition site."
infotexts.missionmessage0.deep_destory_grizzlies_b: "The once-invincible Grizzly Squad has suffered a major blow."
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_separatist_b: "The Separatists successfully captured the outpost. Their influence is growing daily."
infotexts.missionsuccess.deep_destory_coalition_ba: "We succeeded! Those Coalition bastards are all dead!"
infotexts.missionfailure.deep_destory_coalition_ba: "The Coalition forces captured the outpost, but we will return."
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m2_turret: A small turret equipped with an M2 heavy machine gun. The M2 HMG uses conventional ammunition and does not require supercapacitors to fire. Uses 12.7x99mm rounds. Combined with a rate of fire of 500 RPM, it provides effective suppression against small monsters.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m2_loader: Can load different ammunition types for the M2 heavy machine gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m2_ammobox_cheap: Cheap ammunition for the M2 HMG. Produced in large quantities by reducing bullet mass, propellant charge, etc. (Ammo Count: 300, very suitable for dealing with small targets)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_m2_ammobox_tit: Standard ammunition for the M2 HMG. Smaller quantity per box, but each round has high damage and armor penetration. (Ammo Count: 150, very suitable for dealing with elite targets)
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_in_water: Triggers penalty mechanism when enemies are in water. Immune to pressure, hypoxia, general damage. Takes 3x shrapnel residue damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_nuclear_battery: Nuclear battery developed by Deep Diving Armory. Lightweight and compact, provides infinite power to electrical devices.
infotexts.entitydescription.gssh01_headset: Standard issue headset for Separatist soldiers. Longer communication range than standard headsets, includes auto-injection function. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Auxiliary upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.m32_headset: Coalition tactical headset. Better communication signal, includes auto-injection. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Auxiliary upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.walker_headset: Walker headset features smart injection function, accurately controlling the dosage needed to treat wounds, preventing opioid addiction. Also has a long communication range. ‖color:gui.red‖(Can install Auxiliary upgrades)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_learn: By incorporating extensive textbook content into the chip, educational material is played cyclically when the user wears the headset, greatly benefiting the wearer. (+100% Skill Gain Speed)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_learn_2: You strive for excellence in learning your skills and have achieved good results. (+200% Skill Gain Speed) (All skills will not be lower than 60)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_learn_3: "Learning is endless; the sea of knowledge is boundless." (+300% Skill Gain Speed) (All skills will not be lower than 80) (Allows all skill levels to exceed 100)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_mechanical: Basics of Mechanical Engineering, 6th Edition textbook, published by Europa Industrial University. Teaches beginners mechanical engineering from scratch. (+100% Mechanical Engineering Skill Gain Speed, +30% Mechanical Device Repair Speed, +30% Hull Repair Speed, +30% Plasma Cutter Efficiency) (50% Water Current Resistance)
infotexts.entityname.chip_electrician: "Basics of Electrical and Electronic Engineering" Auxiliary Upgrade
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_electrician: Basics of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, 6th Edition textbook, published by Europa Industrial University. From beginner to burial. (+100% Electrical Engineering Skill Gain Speed, +50% Device Repair Speed, +30% Max Electrical Device Repair Condition, 50% Burn Resistance, 50% Electrical Shock Resistance) (50% Water Current Resistance)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_security: Published by Europa Military University. Contains the written procedures for training new recruits, helping you progress from rookie to qualified soldier. (+100% Weapon Handling Skill Gain Speed, +10% Speed, +10% Max Health, +20% Melee Damage and Speed, +20% Buff Duration, -20% Debuff Duration) (50% Water Current Resistance, -20% Spread, +10% Turret Fire Rate)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_security_2: After facing the monsters of the abyss and outpost enemies, you have achieved many merits and been promoted to Sergeant First Class. (+200% Weapon Handling Skill Gain Speed, +20% Speed, +20% Max Health, +40% Melee Damage and Speed, +40% Buff Duration, -40% Debuff Duration) (80% Water Current Resistance, -25% Spread, +15% Turret Fire Rate) (-50% Damage dealt to friendly targets, -20% Turret Power Consumption)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_captain: Operating a submarine on Europa is no easy task. This Navigation and Economic Management textbook can lend you a hand! ‖color:gui.red‖(Only effective for one person; disabled if multiple wearers)‖end‖ (+100% Helm Skill Gain Speed, +10% Reputation Gain, Mission Money Reward, Experience Gain) (+1 Max Mission Count, +3 Special Sale Items in Store, +10% Sell Price, -10% Buy Price)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_captain_2: As the leadership core, the captain's coordinated combat with the crew enhances their combat effectiveness. ‖color:gui.red‖(Only effective for one person; disabled if multiple wearers)‖end‖ (All nearby crew members gain: 10% Stun and Physical Damage Resistance, 10% Movement Speed, +10% Experience Gain) (+200% Helm Skill Gain Speed, +15% Reputation Gain, Mission Money Reward, Experience Gain) (+2 Max Mission Count, +6 Special Sale Items in Store, +15% Sell Price, -15% Buy Price)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_medic: 7th Edition textbook published by Europa Medical University. Diagnostics grants doctors the ability to make initial diagnoses of ailments. (+100% Medical Skill Gain Speed, +10% Run Speed, +20% Poison Effectiveness, +50% CPR Effectiveness) (+10% Gene Splicing Effectiveness, -50% Genetic Contamination Chance)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_medic_2: 7th Edition textbook published by Europa Medical University. Internal Medicine is a must-learn textbook for every doctor. (+200% Medical Skill Gain Speed, +20% Run Speed, +30% Poison Effectiveness, +70% CPR Effectiveness) (+20% Gene Splicing Effectiveness, -70% Genetic Contamination Chance)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_assistant: The gospel compiled by the Clown Matriarch, guiding clowns towards fun. (+50% Skill Gain Speed, +10% Speed, Gain Clown Power and Hypoxia Resistance) (Gain Psychosis)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_assistant_2: A classic work by the Master Prankster, teaching you how to attract others' attention (Master Prankster not responsible if you get beaten up). (+100% Skill Gain Speed, +20% Speed, Gain Clown Power and Hypoxia Resistance) (Gain Irritating Presence)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_mechanical_2: One of the essential study materials for every professional mechanic, bringing you the unique charm of mechanics. (Mechanical Engineering skill will not be lower than 55) (+200% Mechanical Engineering Skill Gain Speed, +50% Mechanical Device Repair Speed, +50% Hull Repair Speed, +50% Plasma Cutter Efficiency) (+50% Deconstructor Speed, +50% Fabricator Speed, +1 Item Crafting Quality) (80% Water Current Resistance)
infotexts.entityname.chip_mechanical_3: "Theory of Machines and Mechanisms and Their Applications" Auxiliary Upgrade
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_mechanical_3: Professional textbook published by Europa Industrial University. Thicker than a certain Earth dictionary. Fortunately, its content has been compressed into the headset. (Mechanical Engineering skill will not be lower than 90) (+300% Mechanical Engineering Skill Gain Speed, +100% Mechanical Device Repair Speed, +100% Hull Repair Speed, +100% Plasma Cutter Efficiency) (+200% Deconstructor Speed, +200% Fabricator Speed, +2 Item Crafting Quality) (+200% Damage dealt to Thalamus)
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_electrician_2: Essential textbook for professional engineers. Knowledge is power! (Electricity!) (Electrical Engineering skill will not be lower than 55) (+200% Electrical Engineering Skill Gain Speed, +70% Device Repair Speed, 70% Burn Resistance, 70% Electrical Shock Resistance) (+50% Deconstructor Speed, +50% Fabricator Speed, +50% Max Electrical Device Repair Condition, +1 Item Crafting Quality) (80% Water Current Resistance)
infotexts.entityname.chip_electrician_3: "Electrical and Electronic Control Circuits" Auxiliary Upgrade
infotexts.entitydescription.chip_electrician_3: Textbook required for master engineers. Still published by our old alma mater, Europa Industrial University. Helping you get ashore! (Electrical Engineering skill will not be lower than 90) (+300% Electrical Engineering Skill Gain Speed, +100% Device Repair Speed, 90% Burn Resistance, 90% Electrical Shock Resistance) (+200% Deconstructor Speed, +200% Fabricator Speed, +100% Max Device Repair Condition, +2 Item Crafting Quality)
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_healmet_talent: Neural Adjustment connected. Insert different chips to activate different effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_headset: Auxiliary Upgrade connected. Insert different chips to activate different effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.ore_refining_machine: Industrial-grade small ore refinery. Powered by nuclear battery, no wiring needed for refining process.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_graphite: Highly purified graphite. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_diamond: Highly purified diamond. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_cryolite: Highly purified cryolite. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_pyromorphi: Highly purified pyromorphite. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_chrysopras: Highly purified chrysoprase. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_langbeinit: Highly purified langbeinite. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_saltpeter: Highly purified saltpeter. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_refine_sulfur: Highly purified sulfur. Deconstructing yields more materials. Can also be sold at a high price.
infotexts.locationdescription.deep_mobile_city_typ: Typhoon-class mobile city. Its massive frame carries an entire city, navigating beneath Europa's ice.
infotexts.locationdescription.deep_outpost_fight: The enemy has captured this outpost. Requesting backup!
infotexts.locationchange.None.changeto.deep_mobile: Typhoon-class mobile city has moved to [previousname] and will make a brief stop.
Typhoon-class mobile city has departed from [previousname].
infotexts.locationchange.None.changeto.deep_outpos: An attempt was made to establish an outpost at [previousname], but it was captured by the enemy.
infotexts.locationchange.deep_outpost_fight.change: With the help of the Typhoon fleet, the remaining enemies at [previousname] have been cleared.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_pistol_mozambique: When own health is below 50%, holding a pistol triggers Mozambique Drill: +50% Damage, +10% Rate of Fire.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_sniper_heavy_aim: Controlling a heavy anti-materiel rifle isn't easy. Just picking it up consumes a lot of stamina. When health less than 80%: -10% Damage, +30% Spread. When health less than 50%: -20% Damage, +60% Spread. When health less than 20%: -30% Damage, +90% Spread.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_machinegun_shot: Recoil control is crucial to becoming a qualified machine gunner. -70% Spread when crouching while holding a machine gun.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_wuchuan: When the Wuchuan (Dark Wind) rises, retreat to survive, advance to conquer. Can block with the blade, or dash forward like the wind. Right-click to charge stance. Enemy attacks on Wuchuan accelerate the charge. When the charge bar is full, activate Swift Step (Sata). Swift Step: 90% Stun Resistance, +70% Movement Speed, 100% Water Current Resistance, +200% Melee Damage, +100% Melee Speed. Effect diminishes over time. Ride the Wind: While crouching, +300% Melee Speed, 80% Damage Resistance. Leaf Concealment: When health is below 50% while crouching, gain Concealment. Enemies cannot detect you.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_talent_all: (Collection of all Deep Diving Armory talents, consolidated into one talent to reduce lag.) Features Deep Diving Armory's unique numerical balance: - Vanilla and other modded firearms deal 4x headshot damage and +30% gun damage when outside of water. - You are able to fight using firearms from other mods. - When underwater, Deep Diving firearms suffer a -60% damage penalty due to water resistance (This can be offset by installing 'Underwater Drag Optimization'). Lethal Headshot is a crucial mechanic in Deep Diving combat, allowing you to 'cheese' high-tier enemies with low-tier weapons. Lethal Headshot only affects humans and is ineffective against other creatures.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_chip_talent: Weapon Upgrade connected. Insert different chips to activate different effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_melee_talent: Dagger Usage Guide: Assassinate enemies in smoke.
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_armor_talent: Armor Upgrade connected. Insert different chips to activate different effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_knife: Tactical dagger made from titanium-aluminum alloy. Can be used for close-quarters combat or assassination missions. ‖color:gui.red‖(Attacking enemies in smoke performs an execution: 20x Melee Damage Bonus, -50% Attack Speed)‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.deep_headshot_3x_balan: Unique numerical balance for Deep Diving Armory. Vanilla and other modded firearms deal 4x headshot damage and +30% gun damage when not in water. You can use firearms from other mods in combat. When in water, Deep Diving firearms suffer -60% damage due to water resistance (can be offset by installing "Underwater Drag Optimization"). Lethal Headshot is a crucial mechanic in Deep Diving combat. You can use low-tier weapons to cheese high-tier enemies. Lethal Headshot only applies to humans not in water, ineffective against other creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_3: Metal plate using aluminum as the primary defense. Aluminum is relatively soft, providing lower protection level. Can defend against low-penetration small caliber rounds. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_4: Metal plate using iron as the primary defense. Higher protection level than aluminum plates, but also heavier. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed, -15 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_5: Metal plate using light steel as the primary defense. Sacrificing mobility is unavoidable in the pursuit of higher protection levels. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-30% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_6: Double-layer metal plate using Grade 45 steel as the primary defense. Reaches protection level 6, but sacrifices considerable ergonomics. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-40% Movement Speed, -25 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_7: Double-layer metal plate using composite steel as the primary defense. "With our current technology, we can only improve ballistic protection by adding more material. It's a reluctant necessity..." ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 7)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-50% Movement Speed, -30 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_8: Double-layer metal plate using Physicorium plate as the primary defense. A combination of Physicorium rods and hardened steel, greatly increasing material hardness. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-60% Movement Speed, -40 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_9: Triple-layer metal plate using ultra heavy Physicorium as the primary defense. An ultra-heavy plate primarily made of three layers of Physicorium rods. Offers extreme protection, but at a great cost. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 9)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-80% Movement Speed, -50 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_10: Triple-layer metal plate using Composite Tungsten Physicorium as the primary defense. Composite Tungsten Physicorium is still in the experimental stage. This material was developed at the Coalition Material Science Research Base. Exceptional quality, Mohs hardness far exceeding diamond. Using it as material for ballistic plates will make them indestructible. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 10)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.1)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-80% Movement Speed, -60 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_arm_4: Arm plate using iron as the primary defense, providing basic protection for your arms. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.15)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_arm_6: Arm plate using Grade 45 steel as the primary defense. Can effectively protect arms from gunfire. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.15)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-30 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_arm_8: Arm plate using Physicorium as the primary defense. With a protection level of 8, it can defend against most high-penetration rounds. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.15)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-40 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_metal_groin: Groin plate using iron as the primary defense, providing basic protection for your thighs. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.15)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-15 Weapon Handling)

Groin plate using Grade 45 steel as the primary defense. Can effectively protect thighs from gunfire. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.15)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-25 Weapon Handling)

Groin plate using Physicorium as the primary defense. With a protection level of 8, it can defend against most high-penetration rounds. ‖color:gui.red‖(Metal plates never break, but are heavy)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 1.0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.15)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-35 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_ceramic_4: Ceramic plate primarily made of alumina. Alumina has higher density, lower hardness, is easy to process, and cheap. Very suitable for entry-level ceramic plates. ‖color:gui.red‖(Ceramic plate absorbs damage when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_ceramic_6: Ceramic plate primarily made of silicon carbide. Silicon carbide has medium density, medium hardness, and a moderate price increase. Good cost-performance ratio, very suitable for making mid-tier ceramic plates. ‖color:gui.red‖(Ceramic plate absorbs damage when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_ceramic_8: Ceramic plate primarily made of boron carbide. Boron carbide has low density, high hardness. Downside is difficult processing and high price. Low cost-performance ratio, but provides high-level protection. ‖color:gui.red‖(Ceramic plate absorbs damage when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_ceramic_10: Ceramic plate primarily made of Physicorium-hardened tungsten. The hardened state exhibited by tough tungsten when catalyzed by Physicorium rods. Used for making the highest-end ceramic plates. ‖color:gui.red‖(Ceramic plate absorbs damage when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 10)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-10% Movement Speed, -10 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_composite_6: Composite ballistic plate featuring an outer Alumina layer and an inner Kevlar layer design. Provides a strong protection level while enhancing durability. As a mid-tier composite material plate, it is highly praised among Coalition forces. ‖color:gui.red‖(Composite plate provides high damage reduction when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 6)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.5)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_composite_8: Composite ballistic plate featuring an outer Silicon Carbide layer and an inner Ultra-High-Molecular-Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE) layer design. Can provide a high level of ballistic protection. As a high-end composite material plate, it is generally issued to elite units. ‖color:gui.red‖(Composite plate provides high damage reduction when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 8)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.4)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_plate_composite_1: Composite ballistic plate featuring an outer Boron Carbide layer and an inner Ultra-High-Molecular-Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE) layer design. Represents the pinnacle of current material science. As the top-tier composite material plate, its synthesis data has always been protected by the Coalition. ‖color:gui.red‖(Composite plate provides high damage reduction when intact, requires repair after breaking)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Protection Level: 10)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Higher is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Post-Penetration Damage Multiplier: 0.3)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Blunt Trauma Multiplier (Non-Penetrating): 0.05)‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Lower is better‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed, -20 Weapon Handling)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mobile_shield: A freely deployable and retractable shield. When placed on the ground, it can defend against most bullets, but note that it cannot defend against explosives. ‖color:gui.green‖(Base Durability: 400, Can be reinforced with plates)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When worn on the back, the back, back of the head, and back of the thighs are protected by the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When holding the shield: Head, Torso, Arms, and Thighs gain 50% Shrapnel Residue Resistance)‖end‖ (-30% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Repaired with reinforcement plates)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_mobile_shield_fix: A reinforcement plate for the shield, made of steel bars, providing higher durability for the deployable shield. ‖color:gui.green‖(Can withstand 10 additional bullet hits)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(Can repair the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Place inside the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Repair at a fabricator)‖end‖

A reinforcement plate for the shield, made of titanium-aluminum alloy, providing high support before structural failure. ‖color:gui.green‖(Can withstand 20 additional bullet hits)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(Can repair the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Place inside the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Repair at a fabricator)‖end‖

A reinforcement plate for the shield, made of Physicorium, possessing very high durability. ‖color:gui.green‖(Can withstand 30 additional bullet hits)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(Can repair the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Place inside the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Repair at a fabricator)‖end‖

A reinforcement plate for the shield, made of Tungsten Physicorium. Incredibly hard, yet also has excellent toughness. ‖color:gui.green‖(Can withstand 50 additional bullet hits)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(Can repair the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Place inside the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Repair at a fabricator)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_single_handed_shi: A one-handed shield made of lightweight ballistic material. While defending against light weapons, it allows the operator to use one-handed weapons for tactical shooting. ‖color:gui.green‖(Base Durability: 300, Can be reinforced with plates)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When worn on the back, the back, back of the head, and back of the thighs are protected by the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When holding the shield: Head, Torso, Arms, and Thighs gain 50% Shrapnel Residue Resistance)‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Easily destroyed by explosives)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Repaired with reinforcement plates)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_flash_handed_shie: A shield made primarily of Tungsten Physicorium. A high-power flash is installed on the front, capable of blinding enemies at close range. ‖color:gui.green‖(Base Durability: 500, Can be reinforced with plates)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When worn on the back, the back, back of the head, and back of the thighs are protected by the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When holding the shield: Head, Torso, Arms, and Thighs gain 50% Shrapnel Residue Resistance)‖end‖ (-20% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Easily destroyed by explosives)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖(Repaired with reinforcement plates)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_double_handed_shi: A heavy shield welded from double-layer ballistic material. A heavy armor warrior wielding this shield will defend against most enemy fire. ‖color:gui.red‖(Recommended for multiplayer use)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(Infinite durability when held with two hands, 500 durability when deployed on the ground)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When worn on the back, the back, back of the head, and back of the legs are protected by the shield)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖(When holding the shield: Head, Torso, Arms, and Legs gain 70% Shrapnel Residue Resistance)‖end‖ (-40% Movement Speed) ‖color:gui.red‖(Cannot sprint when holding with two hands)‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_saintpredator: MeiJiuLe's exclusive weapon. The word "Salvation" is engraved on the launcher's paint, its meaning known only to the weapon's first owner. ‖color:gui.red‖"I will entrust this power to you."‖end‖ (Features two modes: High-Angle Mode - warhead splits into multiple projectiles and detonates immediately upon impact; Programmable Mode - warhead ignores obstacles and splits only after reaching the mouse cursor's position) ‖color:gui.red‖(Built-in 3x scope magnification)‖end‖ (Has a massive kill radius, be mindful of friendly fire)
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_clustermsl_sp: A cluster missile loaded with numerous MIRV incendiary warheads, capable of causing devastating damage over a wide area upon detonation. Although it cannot light up the sky, it can tear a dazzling gap in the oppressive darkness of Europa. ‖color:gui.red‖"Whether it's this cold and noisy world, or me... No matter how hard it rains, it can never be washed clean."‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.deep_APS: Man-Portable Active Protection System that detonates incoming explosives before they can hit their targets. ‖color:gui.green‖Intercept Range: 3m‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖Max Target Speed: 5-30‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Intercept Probability: 95%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Operation Time:5s‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖Cooldown:15s‖end‖
